source: 魔大戦 すべてを焼きつくした、その戦いが 終わった時、世界から 「魔法」という力が消え去った
translation: When that conflict that burned all to naught ended, the power known as "magic" vanished from the world.

source: そして１０００年… 鉄、火薬、蒸気機関 人々は機械の力を使い、世界を よみがえらせた
translation: Then 1000 years passed... Iron, gunpowder, steam engines; mankind used the power of machines to revive the world.

source: 今またここに、伝説となった 「魔法」の力を復活させ その強大な武力によって 世界を支配しようとする者がいる…
translation: In this time when the power of "magic" has become but a legend, there are those who would restore it once more and use its might to rule the world...

source: 人はまた そのあやまちを くり返そうとしているのか…
translation: Are people about to repeat their mistakes all over again...?

source: 「あの都市か？ 「魔大戦で氷づけになった１０００年前 の幻獣か…
translation: : That's the city? : A Genjuu trapped in ice during the Great Magic War 1000 years ago...

source: 「また、がせじゃねえのか？ 「フム。 だが、あれの使用許可が出るくらいだ かなり、たしかな情報だろう。
translation: : And it's not just a load of bull? : Hrm. Authorization did come through to use that, though, so the intel must be pretty certain.

source: 「生まれながらに魔導の力を持つ娘か… 魔導アーマーに乗った兵士５０人を たった３分で倒したとか… 恐しい…
translation: : The girl born with the power of sorcery, huh... She beat 50 soldiers in Sorcerous Armor in just three minutes, or so they say... Terrifying...

source: 「大丈夫。頭のかざりの力で思考は 止まっているはずだ。 俺達の命令で思い通りに動く。
translation: : Don't worry. The thing on her head ought to prevent her from thinking. She'll act on our orders just fine.

source: 「東からまわりこむ。 行くぞ！
translation: : We'll circle in from the east. Move out!

source: 「この娘を先頭にして突っこむ ザコにはかまうな。 行くぞ！
translation: : We'll go in with the girl up front. Don't waste effort on the small fry. Move out!

source: ガード「帝国の思うようにさせるか！
translation: Like hell we'll let things go the Empire's way!

source: ガード「帝国の魔導アーマー！？ とうとうこのナルシェにまで！
translation: The Empire's Sorcerous Armor!? They've gotten as far as Narshe!

source: ガード「ナルシェは、俺達ガードが 守る！！
translation: We guards will protect Narshe!!

source: ガード「よし！ はさみうちだっ！
translation: All right! We've got them surrounded!!

source: ガード「炭坑の守りをかためろ！
translation: Fortify the coal mine's defenses!

source: 「情報によれば、新たに掘った 炭坑から氷づけの幻獣が出てきた らしい…… ということは、この奥か？
translation: : According to intel, the icebound Genjuu came from a newly dug coal mine... Which would mean, in here?

source: 不思議な光があふれている…… セーブポイントの説明を聞きますか？ はい いいえ
translation: A mysterious light floods the area... Want an explanation of save points? Yes No

source: セーブポイントでは、「ねぶくろ」や 「テント」と使って休むことや セーブすることができます。 もし全滅しても、セーブしておけば 自動的にその場所からゲームが 再開されます。 この時、ギルや宝箱からとった アイテムなどは、もとにもどって しまいますが、レベルと経験値は へりません。 またワールドマップでは、どこでも セーブすることをできます。
translation: At save points, you can save or use a Sleeping Bag or Tent to rest. If you've made a save, the game will automatically resume from that point even if you're wiped out. When that happens, gil, any items you took from chests, and so on are all reset, but your levels and experience points won't decrease. Also, when on the world map, you can save anywhere.

source: 「俺がやる。 さがっていろ！
translation: : I've got this. Stand back!

source: ガード「幻獣はわたさない！
translation: We won't hand over the Genjuu!

source: ガード「ユミール！ 行け！！
translation: Ymir! Go!!

source: ビックス 「まてよ！！ こいつは…… 思い出したぜ！
translation: Wait!! This beasty... I remember it!

source: ウェッジ 「知ってるのか？
translation: You know about it?

source: ビックス 「以前、雷を食う化け物の話を 聞いたことがある……
translation: I've heard stories before about a monster that eats thunder...

source: ウェッジ 「カラに強力なでんりゅうを たくわえるとかいう……
translation: They say it stores up a powerful electric current in its shell...

source: ビックス 「そうだ。 カラに手をだすなよ、ウェッジ！
translation: Right. Don't lay a finger on the shell, Wedge!

source: ウェッジ 「わかったぜ！
translation: Got it!

source: グゴゴゴゴ……
translation: Gurgle...

source: 「これが… 氷づけの幻獣？
translation: : Is this... the icebound Genjuu?

source: ウェッジ 「おい！なにか様子がへんだ？ なにか不気味な……！
translation: Hey! Something doesn't seem right. There's some kind of creepy...!

source: 氷づけになったモンスターは 怪しげな光を放ちはじめた……
translation: The icebound monster began emitting an eerie light...

source: ウェッジ 「な なんだ この光は！…… うわわわわっー！！！
translation: Wh-what's with this light! ...... Uwawawawaaaah!!!

source: ビックス 「な、なんだー！？ ウェッジ、おい、どこへ消えて しまったんだ？ あっ、か からだが！！
translation: Wh-what the!? Wedge, hey, where'd you disappear to? Ah, m-my body!!

source: 「ここは…
translation: : Where am I...?

source: 老人「ほう… あやつりの輪が外れたばかりだと いうのに…
translation: Oh...? So soon after the manipulation band came off you... OLD MAN: Whoa! And I only just removed the crown!

source: 「頭が…いたい……
translation: : My head... hurts...

source: 老人「無理をするな。 これは、あやつりの輪。 これをつけられればその者の思考は 止まり、人の意のままに動くように なる。
translation: Don't push yourself too hard. This is a manipulation band. Having one of these on put you halts your thoughts, leaving you subject to the will of others.

source: 「何も思いだせない… 老人「大丈夫。 時間がたてば記憶も戻るはずじゃ。 : I can't remember anything... Old Man: That's okay. Your memory should return, in time. GIRL: I can't remember a thing... OLD MAN: Don't worry. It'll all come back to you...in time, that is.
translation: : I can't remember anything... Old Man: That's okay. Your memory should return, in time. GIRL: I can't remember a thing... OLD MAN: Don't worry. It'll all come back to you...in time, that is.

source: 帝国にあやつられていた 生まれながらに魔導の力を持つ 謎の少女……
translation: A mysterious girl born with the power of sorcery who was controlled by the Empire...

source: 「わたし… 名前は…{ティナ}… 老人「ほう… 強い精神力を持っておる。
translation: : I... my name is... {Tina}... Old Man: Oh...? Strong will you have there.

source: 「ここを開けろ！ 「魔導アーマーに乗っていた娘を 出せ！
translation: : Open up! : Hand over the girl who was riding Sorcerous Armor!

source: 「ここを開けるんだ！ 「娘をだせ！ 「そいつは帝国の手先だぞ！！
translation: : Open up! : Hand over the girl! : She's with the Empire!!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「帝国…？ 魔導アーマー…？
translation: Empire...? Sorcerous Armor...?

source: 老人「とにかくここを出るんじゃ。 わしが説明してもやつらは 聞かんじゃろう。
translation: Get out of here for now. I doubt they'll listen even if I explain things to them.

source: 老人「こっちじゃ！
translation: Over here!

source: 老人「裏の炭坑から逃げられるはず。 ここは、わしがくいとめる。 さあ、早く！
translation: You should be able to escape the back way through the coal mines. I'll stall them here. Now hurry!

source: 「あそこにいるぞ！
translation: : She's over there!

source: 「いたぞ！
translation: : Found her!

source: ｹﾌｶ「魔導の力を持つ娘か… ヒッヒッヒッ… この、あやつりの輪をつければ 俺様の思うがままに動くのだあ！
translation: The girl with the power of sorcery... Hee, hee, hee... If I put this manipulation band on you, you'll do whatever I please!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「いやーやめて！！
translation: No, stop it!!

source: ケフカ 「ヒッヒッヒッ そうだ！ 全てを焼きはらうのだ！
translation: Hee, hee, hee, yes! Burn everything to ashes!

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「わがガストラ帝国は魔導の力を 復活させた！ 選ばれた者のみが使うことのできる 神聖な力だ…
translation: My Gastra Empire has revived the power of sorcery! It is a divine power that only the chosen ones can use...

source: ｼﾄﾞ「ケッサクじゃ。 魔導の力と機械の力を組み合わせた きゅうきょくのマシーンじゃ…
translation: It's my masterpiece. The ultimate machine, combining the powers of sorcery and mechanics...

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「いまこそ、わがゲストラ帝国が 世界を支配する時！！
translation: Now is the time for my Gastra Empire to rule the world!! GESTAHL: With our new-found power, nothing can stand in our way!

source: 「ウォー！！ 「ガストラ皇帝バンザーイ！！
translation: : Hurrah!! : Long live Emperor Gastra!!!

source: 老人「やっと来おったか。 ところで、ドロボウからは 足をあらったのか？
translation: You're finally here. By the way, have you wiped your feet clean of being a thief?

source: さすらいの旅人 古代の秘宝を求めて世界をまたにかける トレジャーハンター
translation: A wandering traveler. A treasure hunter who roams the world seeking an arcane treasure from ages past.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ど・ろ・ぼ・う？ 俺を呼ぶならトレジャーハンターと 言ってくれ！ 老人「ハッハッハ！ 同じようなもんじゃろうが！ {ﾛｯｸ}「ちっちっ！ 大ちがいだぜ！！
translation: THIEF? Say "treasure hunter" if you're going to call me anything! Old Man: Ha, ha, ha! It's practically the same thing! {Lock}: Tsk, tsk! There's a huge difference!!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ところで、この俺を 呼び出したのは？ 老人「フム。 実は、例の娘に会った。
translation: Anyhow, what did you call me here for? Old Man: Well. As it happens, I met the girl.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「！？ 魔導の力を持つという娘のことか？
translation: !? You mean the girl they say has the power of sorcery?

source: 老人「今は、この都市のガードに 追われている…… この都市には、帝国に立ち向かうだけの 力がある。だがその自治力の高さゆえに われわれの地下組織リターナーにも 加わろうとしない… 娘は、帝国にあやつられているだけだと いう、わしの説得も聞こうとしない…
translation: She's being pursued by this city's guards right now... The city has strength enough to stand against the Empire. But they're fiercely independent and not about to join with our underground organization, the Returners, either... And they won't listen when I try telling them the girl was just being manipulated by the Empire...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「わかった。 その娘を助け出せばいいんだな。
translation: Got it. I'm supposed to help that girl out.

source: 老人「フム。 ひとまずはフィガロ国王のところへ。
translation: Right. Head to King Figaro to start with.

source: ガード「いたぞ！！
translation: Found her!!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ちっ！ おおぜい来やがった！
translation: Damn! There's so many of them!

source: クポー…
translation: Kupo...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「モーグリ… 助けてくれるっていうのか？
translation: Moogles... You mean you'll help out?

source: クポー！！！
translation: Kupo!!!

source: ﾓｰｸﾞﾘ「ボクたちで、都市のガード達 から{ティナ}を守ります。 説明を聞きますか？
translation: Use us to protect {Tina} from the city guards. Want an explanation?

source: ３つのパーティーに分かれて戦います。 （Ｙ）ボタンを使って、パーティーを きりかえてください。 {ティナ}のいるところまで 攻めこまれたら、負けです。 その前に、敵のガードリーダーを たおしてください。
translation: You'll fight divided into three parties. Use the Y button to switch between parties. If you let them reach {Tina}, you lose. Beat the Guard Leader before then.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「モーグリたち… おんにきるぜ！
translation: Moogles... I owe you one!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「たしか、このスイッチで……
translation: As I recall, this switch...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ん？ 気がついたのか。
translation: Hm? You've come to?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「わたし……助かったの……？ {ﾛｯｸ}「モーグリたちに 感謝するんだな。
translation: I'm... saved...? {Lock}: Thank the moogles.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「うっ…… はっきりと思い出せない。 その前も……ずっと前の事も……
translation: Urgh... I can't remember very well. Or before that... or long ago either...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「記憶がないのか？！
translation: Your memory's gone!?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「でも、時間がたてば 戻るって… {ﾛｯｸ}「記憶が…… 安心しろ。俺が必ず守ってやる。 必ずだ！！ {ﾃｨﾅ}「？？？ {ﾛｯｸ}「記憶をなくした…… 俺は……見すてたりしない…… 必ず守ってやる！！
translation: But it's supposed to come back eventually... {Lock}: Memory... Don't worry. I'll protect you for sure. No matter what!! {Tina}: ??? {Lock}: You lost your memory... I... won't abandon you... I'll protect you no matter what!!

source: ん…… お ま え ら？
translation: Hm...? And who are you?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「やばい。 ひとまずここは南の砂漠にある フィガロに向かおう……
translation: Too risky. Let's head for Figaro in the desert to the south for now...

source: ここは初心者の家。 機械が発達したとはいえ、町の外には まだまだ、われわれの知らない魔物が いる… ここは、そんな危険な世界を旅する人に アドバイスをするところ。
translation: This is the Beginner's House. Regardless of the advance of machinery, outside the city are monsters that remain unknown to us even now... This is a place to advise the people who travel such a dangerous world.

source: これは回復の泉から、くみあげた 水です。ＨＰとＭＰが回復します。 泉は、ところどころにあるから 見のがさないように。
translation: This is water drawn from a recovery spring. It recovers HP and MP. You can find such springs here and there, so try not to overlook them.

source: こんなつぼにも宝が隠されてることが ある。
translation: Treasures may also be hidden in jars like this one.

source: 傷ついたときにはポーションなんかで ＨＰを回復させるんだ。 宿屋にとまれば全回復する。
translation: When hurt, recover HP with a Potion or the like. You recover fully if you stay at an inn.

source: ほっほっほ！ 宝箱には中にモンスターがいることも あるから気をつけてね。
translation: Ho, ho, ho! Treasure boxes may have monsters inside too, so be careful.

source: アクセサリーってしってるかい？
translation: Know about accessories?

source: アクセサリーには、いろいろな 能力（アビリティー）がついています。 たとえば… ダッシューズ…２倍のスピードで歩ける ナイトのこころえ…戦闘中かばう りゅうきしのくつ…戦闘中「ジャンプ」 ガントレット…剣を両手持ちできる メニューで装備すれば、その能力を 身につけることができます。 １人がつけられるアクセサリーは２つ までです。
translation: Accessories have various abilities. For example... Dash Shoes... can walk at double speed. Knight's Expertise... protect others in battle. Wyrmknight's Boots... Jump in battle. Gauntlet... can hold swords two-handed. You can equip them in the menu to apply their abilities. Each member can put on up to two accessories.

source: （Ａ）ボタンで決定。 （Ｂ）ボタンでキャンセル （Ｘ）ボタンでメニュー画面だっ！
translation: (A) button to decide. (B) button to cancel. (X) button for the menu screen!

source: 店で買いものをするとき いろいろなマークがでます。 （上向き三角）は、攻撃力などがアップ （下向き三角）はダウン （イコール）は同じ値になる （Ｅ）はすでに装備しているということ （キャラの下のマーク）は 今のパーティーにいるメンバーを あらわしています。
translation: When shopping in a store, various marks will appear. (Up triangle) means more attack power, etc. (Down triangle) means less. (Equal) means the same value. (E) means already equipped. (Marks below characters) indicate the members in the current party.

source: チョコボの乗りかたを教えてやろう！
translation: Let's teach you how to ride a chocobo!

source: （上）か（Ａ）を押すと前に進む。 （左右）で方向を決める。 おりる時は（Ｂ）ボタン。 おりてしまうと、チョコボは町に 帰ってしまうから気をつけて。
translation: Press (up) or (A) to move forward. Set course with (left) and (right). When you want to get off, use the (B) button. Be careful, since the chocobo will return to town once you've dismounted.

source: コンフィグで戦闘を「ウェイト」 にすると… 戦闘中、魔法やアイテムを 選ぶウィンドウが出ている時、 時間がとまる。 ゆっくり、魔法や アイテムをえらべるわけだ。
translation: When you set battle to Wait under Config... During combat, when a window to select, say, magic or items, is open, time will stop. This means you can select magic or items at leisure.

source: ＬとＲを同時に押せば、逃げられる。
translation: You can flee if you press L and R at the same time.

source: 右下のメーターがいっぱいになると そのキャラのコマンド入力がまわって くる。 ＸかＹでその人のコマンド入力をせずに 次の人にとばすことができる。
translation: When the bottom-right meter becomes full, that character's command input comes up. You can skip to the next character, without entering commands, with X or Y.

source: 魔法で敵を選ぶ時に、ＬかＲをおせば 敵全体に魔法をかけることができる。
translation: If you press L or R when selecting foes with magic, you can cast the spell on all foes.

source: コマンド入力する時に、（左）（右）で 「チェンジ」と「ぼうぎょ」ができる。 「ぼうぎょ」すれば、受けるダメージが 半分だ。 「ぼうぎょ」は次のコマンドを 入力するまできいてる。
translation: You can Change and Defend with (left) and (right) during command input. If you Defend, the damage you take is halved. Defend remains in effect until inputting the next command.

source: はさみうちされるとダメージが大きいよ 敵に後ろを見せてるとさらにだ。
translation: Damage is greater when surrounded, moreso when showing the enemy your back.

source: とびだす数字は 白がダメージ、みどりが回復してるって ことなんだ。
translation: When numbers pop up, white means damage and green means recovery.

source: 後列にすると受けるダメージが半分。 そのかわり攻撃力も半分。 メニューで左をおして、キャラを選んで （Ａ）ボタンで変えられる。
translation: The damage you take is halved in the back row. The tradeoff is your attack power is also halved. You can change in the menu by pressing left, selecting a character, and pressing the (A) button.

source: 自分のステータスによって 色が変わるんだ。
translation: Your color varies depending on your status.

source: 青…「リフレク」 魔法をはねかえす。
translation: Blue... Reflect. Rebounds magic.

source: きいろ…「プロテス」 防ぎょ力アップ
translation: Yellow... Protect. Defense power up.

source: みどりは「シェル」 魔法防ぎょ力アップ
translation: Green is Shell. Magic defense up.

source: 赤は「ヘイスト」 すばやさアップ
translation: Red is Haste. Agility up.

source: 白は「スロウ」 スピードがダウン
translation: White is Slow. Speed down.

source: ピンクは「ストップ」 時間が止まっている
translation: Pink is Stop. Time stands still.

source: この部屋はちょっとむずかしいから なれてから聞いたほうがいいかも… 最初は関係ないことが多いしね。 This room is rather difficult, so it may be better to grow acclimated before listening... For one thing, much of it is irrelevant at first. Might want to go out and get some experience in the world before coming in here!
translation: This room is rather difficult, so it may be better to grow acclimated before listening... For one thing, much of it is irrelevant at first.

source: ステータスの説明を聞きますか？
translation: Listen to an explanation of status?

source: 「とうめい」 なぐり攻撃は、あたらない。 魔法はどんなものでもあたってしまう。 魔法があたるともとに戻る。 「カッパ」 必殺剣などのオリジナルコマンドと 魔法が使えなくなる。 「ゾンビ」 はだの色が変わって ＨＰが０でも動いていたら「ゾンビ」 敵、みかた関係なしに攻撃する。 「せいすい」でしかなおせない。 「こんらん」「すいみん」 なぐられると、もとに戻る。
translation: Physical attacks won't hit. Magic will hit no matter what. Reverts to normal when magic hits. Kappa: Can't use magic or special commands like Deathblow Sword. Zombie: Altered skin tone and movement even at zero HP are signs of a zombie. Attacks friend and foe indiscriminately. Can't cure except with Holy Water. Confusion and Sleep: Revert to normal when struck.

source: アンデッド（ゆうれいとか）にケアル とかポーションを使えば ダメージを与えられる。
translation: You can inflict damage on the undead (such as ghosts) by using things like Cure or Potions.

source: 「リレイズ」 戦闘不能になっても自動的に生き返る。 「リジェネ」 じょじょにＨＰが回復する。
translation: Revive automatically if incapacitated. Regen: HP gradually recovers.

source: ３属性とは、炎、氷、雷のこと。 それぞれファイア、ブリザド、 サンダーに代表させる。
translation: The prime traits mean Flame, Ice, and Thunder. These are exemplified by Fire, Blizzard, and Thunder.

source: 相手の魔法をはね返す「リフレク」 時間がたつとその効果は消える。 また青魔法は、リフレクで はね返されないものがある。
translation: Reflect rebounds the opponent's magic. Its effect expires after time passes. There's also Blue Magic, which cannot be rebounded using Reflect.

source: 「まふうけん」 魔法を吸収して自分のＭＰにする。 次のコマンドを入力するか、１回吸収 するまできいている。 「トランス」 攻撃力がアップ。 トランスできる時は、戦闘を するたびに増えていく 「おどる」「あばれる」 １回入力すると、戦闘が終わるまで ずっとやってる。
translation: Absorbs magic and converts it to your MP. Effective until the next command input or until it absorbs one time. Transform: Offensive ability up. The duration you can stay transformed increases with each battle you fight. Dance and Rage: Once input, you'll keep doing that until combat ends.

source: 「ぶんしん」になると、攻撃が あたりにくくなる。
translation: Use Decoy, and attacks will have a hard time hitting.

source: 「ひんし」の時こそ、一発逆転の チャンス。 思いきって「たたかう」を選べば かくし必殺技がでることがあるぞ！
translation: When Near Death, that's your chance to turn things around. A secret deathblow skill may come of it if you boldly select Battle!

source: 「ひっさつけん」は自分で名前を 変えることができる。 メニューの「とくしゅ」の 「ひっさつけん」で技を選んで （Ａ）ボタンだ。つけおわったら スタートボタンで決定する。
translation: You can change Deathblow Sword names yourself. Choose Deathblow Sword under Special on the menu and press the (A) button. When done setting it, finalize it with the start button.

source: 「リフレク」の話 １度リフレクではねかえった魔法は もう１度リフレクで、はねかえすことは できない。 これを応用した攻撃がある。 みかたにリフレクをかけ、そいつに 攻撃魔法をかける… わかるかな？ About Reflect... Magic that has been rebounded by Reflect once cannot be rebounded by Reflect a second time. There's an attack that applies this. Cast Reflect on an ally, then cast attack magic on him... get it? "About Rflect" "Rflect" doesn't block spells that have been "Rflected" off others. Enemy protected by Rflect? Try bouncing an attack off a Rflect-protected individual in your party!
translation: About Reflect... Magic that has been rebounded by Reflect once cannot be rebounded by Reflect a second time. There's an attack that applies this. Cast Reflect on an ally, then cast attack magic on him... get it?

source: 待て。
translation: Wait.

source: ん？ お前か？ 通ってよい。
translation: Hm? Oh, it's you. You may pass.

source: 「この娘が…

source: 「おっと失礼。
translation: : Ah, excuse me.

source: 「初対面のレディに対して する態度ではなかったな。
translation: : That was hardly a proper attitude for my first meeting with a lady.

source: 機械文明の旗手 砂漠の城フィガロを有し 帝国との同盟も結んでいる若き王……
translation: At the forefront of technological civilization is the young king of the desert castle of Figaro, bound in an alliance with the Empire...

translation: Heh, heh. Surprised I know a king?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「じゃあ またな。
translation: Well, see you later.

translation: You're an Imperial soldier, he says. No need to worry. Figaro is allied with the Gastra Empire. Make yourself at home and stay a while. Besides, I couldn't possibly harm a lady.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「なぜ 私によくしてくれるの？ 私のこの力が。 {Tina}: Why are you being so nice to me? It must be this power of mine. {TERRA}: Look, why are you helping me? Is it because of my...abilities?
translation: Why are you being so nice to me? It must be this power of mine.

translation: First of all, your beauty has captivated my heart. Second, I can't help but wonder what you're looking for in a man...

source: 魔導の力の事はその次かな。

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「………？ どうしたの？

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「また後で 私のところへ来てくれ。

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「そうなのね…… 普通の女の人なら、その言葉に何かの 感情を持つのね。 でも わたしは……
translation: It figures... A normal woman would have felt something at those words. But I...

source: この先はフィガロ城機関部。 急な出動に備えて メンテの真最中でっせ！
translation: Beyond here is Figaro Castle's engine room. We're undergoing constant maintenance to be ready to go into action at any time!

source: 神官長「{エドガー}にも双子の 弟がいました。 家族おもいのいい子だったのに。
translation: {Edgar} had a younger twin brother. He was a good, family-minded boy.

source: 「兄貴 親父突然どうしたんだろ？ 後継ぎの話なんてしだして… {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「お前は気づかなかったか？ 親父のやせた顔をみて。
translation: : Big bro. What's wrong with dad all of a sudden? And they're starting to talk about an heir... {Edgar}: Haven't you realized? Look how thin dad's face is.

source: 「？……何の事だい？
translation: : ? ...what's that supposed to mean?

source: 「兄貴！
translation: : Big bro!
: Tears...?

translation: {Edgar}'s younger twin brother, who cast aside his status as royalty and fled the castle to take hold of freedom.

source: 神官長「そう…… {マッシュ}という名で…あの子も もう立派な大人になっているはず。 国を出たときには {エドガー}よりも小さな おとなしい子でしたが 今はどこでどうしているのかしら。 High Priest: Yes... {Mash} was his name... That boy should be a fine adult by now, too. When he left the country he was smaller and quieter than {Edgar}. I wonder what's become of him. MATRON: Yes... His name is {SABIN}. Oh, he looked so like his father! When he ran away, he was a sweet little child. I wonder what he's like now?
translation: Yes... {Mash} was his name... That boy should be a fine adult by now, too. When he left the country he was smaller and quieter than {Edgar}. I wonder what's become of him.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「いかがだったかな？ 私の城は？ {Edgar}: How was it? My castle, that is. {EDGAR}: Well? How do you like my castle?
translation: How was it? My castle, that is.

source: {エドガー}さま！ 帝国の者が来ました。

translation: Dammit, {Edgar}! Building a fucking lame-ass castle in a place like this. Spare a little thought for poor little me, sent out here on recon!

source: ケフカさま。 今日はいったい何の…… ｹﾌｶ「どけ！！

translation: I've heard you've overthrown three countries. What are your intentions? Imperial Soldier: That's not for you to know.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「同盟を結んでいる わが国へも攻め込まんという 勢いだな。 帝国兵「同盟？ねぼけるな！ こんなちっぽけな国が！
translation: You seem poised to invade even my country, which is bound to yours in alliance. Imperial Soldier: Alliance? Quit dreaming! A puny country like this?

translation: What brings Emperor Gastra's direct subordinate, the Sorcerer Cefca, out of his way to come here? Cefca: I've heard a girl fled here from the Empire.

translation: Could you mean the girl said to possess the power of sorcery...? Cefca: None of your business. Never mind that, is she here?

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「さあ…

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「娘は星の数ほど いるけどなあ… ｹﾌｶ「かくしても、何もいいことはない のにねえ… ヒッヒッヒ…
translation: The girls here number as many as the stars in the sky... Cefca: Nothing good will come of hiding her... hee, hee, hee...

source: ｹﾌｶ「ま せいぜいフィガロが つぶされないようにいのって いるんだな！
translation: Well, you'd better just pray your hardest Figaro doesn't end up getting crushed!

That's the trouble with being king. Excuse me. {EDGAR}: I'd love to chat with you, but the Chancellor and I must plan our strategy. Sometimes I hate being a king! If you'll excuse me.
translation: I'd like to talk with you at length, but I have to plan out strategy with my chancellors. That's the trouble with being king. Excuse me.

translation: Sorry to make you feel uneasy. I'm... {Tina}: {Lock}, right? I heard about you from {Edgar}-san. You're a thief, aren't you?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「トレジャーハンターだよ。

translation: {Edgar} is bound in alliance with the Empire on the surface, but behind the scenes he wants to join forces with an anti-Imperial group, the Returners. I'm the go-between for that.

translation: ...were one. You were manipulated by the Empire; that's all fake. But now it's different.

translation: I really... don't understand. Thinking about what I should do... makes my head hurt.

translation: It means you've got your own will from now on. Don't think too hard about it now. Your way will come into sight soon enough.

translation: Hand over the girl! {Edgar}: I told you, she's not here! Cefca: In that case, you'll all burn to death now. Hee, hee, hee!

{ロック} 「いいんだ、あやまるのはこっち のほうだ、あんたにおどろいたり して……

translation: He's right, really! It's my first time seeing magic, so I just kind of got startled. But... Just how did you...?

translation: What's it matter, {Edgar}? {Tina} can use magic. We can't use it. That's all there is to it. And we need {Tina}'s magic now!

translation: We're members of the Returners, an underground organization. {Edgar}: Would you mind meeting with Bannan, the leader? The power of Sorcery has become key to this war.

translation: {Tina}, you have the power of sorcery. That power and the Genjuu reacted with each other. There's some connection... {Tina}: I don't know a thing! Using this power just comes to me naturally, same as anything else...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「すまない。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「私はどうすれば…… {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「帝国が{ティナ}の力と その秘密をねらって 追ってくるだろう。 力が帝国の手にわたったら 世界はおしまいだ。 {ティナ}も自分の持っている力の 正体を知りたいだろう？
translation: Sorry. {Tina}: What should I do...? {Edgar}: The Empire is bound to come after us, seeking your power and its secrets, {Tina}. If that power were to fall into the Empire's hands, the world would be done for. You want to know the truth about the powers you have, don't you?

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「ならば、バナンに会い 真実を見きわめてほしい。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「……

translation: {Edgar}-sama, where are you headed? {Edgar}: We're passing through the cave and heading east to South Figaro town. After that, we'll proceed north to Returner headquarters. {Edgar}: I want you to head back to Figaro Castle and report on this. : Yes, sir! Be careful!

translation: The town's eastern... ...thus ...if you invade from there... ...!? Ah! Wh-what is it? You really shouldn't just barge in. I'm in the middle of writing a letter!

translation: Daddy's really important so famous people come eat here a lot. Just the other day, Leo the... ... Never mind, it's nothing.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「この食器は……？ あいつが愛用していた……
translation: This dish...? An old favorite...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「{マッシュ}がここに……？
translation: {Mash}... here...?

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「おいこんな…
translation: Hey, do you...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「男をしらんか？
translation: Know this man?

source: 「ほいほい。しっとるよ。 ２、３日前にお師匠のダンカン様が 殺されてね。 その直後に山に登ったよ。 ダンカン様の息子、バルガスも 行方知れずでねえ… ここもこんなにあれちまって…
translation: : Yup, yup. I shore do. Climbed th' mountain righ' aftar mastar Duncan-sama dun got kilt two, three days ago. Dunno whar Duncan-sama's son Vargas got to neither... Things're gettin' stormy here...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「やはり {マッシュ}はダンカンの弟子に… そんな高名なかたにお世話になって いたとは…。
translation: So {Mash} really did wind up as Duncan's student... Never expected him to win the favor of someone so famous...

source: ﾊﾞﾙｶﾞｽ「{マッシュ}の手の者か？
translation: Are you working for {Mash}?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「何者だ！？
translation: Who're you!?

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「{マッシュ}？ {マッシュ}はいるのか？
translation: {Mash}? Is he here?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「さっきから うろちょろしていたのはお前だな？ ﾊﾞﾙｶﾞｽ「知るか！
translation: You're the one who's been shadowing us since earlier, aren't you? Vargas: Who gives a damn!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「あなたね？ 格闘家ダンカンを殺して逃げたと言う 弟子は。
translation: It's you, isn't it? The student they say fled after killing Duncan, the martial artist.

source: ﾊﾞﾙｶﾞｽ「ふ、貴様らが何者とて つかまるわけにはゆかん。 このバルガスに出会った事を不運と 思って死んでもらうぞ！
translation: Hmph, whoever you are, I'm not about to get caught. You'll die now, and realize how unlucky you were to meet Vargas!!

source: チィ！ こざかしい！！ まとめて、あの世に送ってやる！
translation: Tch! Wise-asses!! I'll send you all on to the afterlife!

source: 「やめろっ！！ バルガス！
translation: : Vargas! Stop!!

source: バルガス 「{マッシュ}か！
translation: Oh, it's {Mash}!

source: {マッシュ} 「バルガス、なぜ、なぜ、 なぜ、ダンカン師匠を殺した？ 実の息子で、兄弟子の貴方が！
translation: Vargas, why, why, why did you kill Master Duncan? You, his own son and senior apprentice!

source: バルガス 「それはなあ… 奥技継承者は 息子の俺ではなく… ひろい子のおまえにさせると ぬかしたからだ！
translation: Well, you see... the successor to his secret arts was not me, his son... He spurned me to favor you, the one he took in!

source: {マッシュ} 「ちがう！ 師はあなたの…
translation: You're wrong! The master...

source: バルガス 「どう違うんだ？ 違わないさ、そうお前の顔に 書いてあるぜ！
translation: How am I wrong? I'm not wrong, it's written all over your face!

source: {マッシュ} 「師は、俺ではなく……バルガス！ あなたの、素質を……
translation: I'm not the one he... Vargas! Your potential...

source: バルガス 「たわごとなど、ききたくない わ！自らあみだした奥技！ そのパワーみるがいい！！ 必殺！ 連風燕略拳！！！
translation: I don't want to hear your nonsense! I worked out my own secret arts! Behold their power!! Deathblow! Renfuuenryaku Ken!!!

source: バルガス 「さすがは{マッシュ}！ 親父が、見込んだだけのこと はある男
translation: Not bad, {Mash}! I'd expect no less from the man my old man had such high hopes for.

source: {マッシュ} 「や…… やるのか…
translation: Do... do we have to do this...?

source: バルガス 「宿命だ。そしてお前には 私を倒すことはできぬ！ それもまた、宿命だ！！！
translation: It's fate. And it's impossible for you to defeat me! That, too, is also fate!!!

source: 終死拳！
translation: Shuushi Ken!

source: フッ…… お前の命も 後わずかだ！
translation: Hmph... Your life is nearly up!

source: どうした{マッシュ}！ 後がないぞ！！
translation: What's the matter, {Mash}? This is it for you!!

source: オラ オラ どうした！
translation: Hey now, what's the matter!?

source: バルガス 「さて、そろそろ おわりにさせてもらおうか！
translation: Now, I think it's about time to bring this to an end!

source: {マッシュ} 「師が言っていた…… ひっさつわざだ…… ひっさつわざを選んで ひだり みぎ ひだり Ａだ！
translation: Like the master told me... a Deathblow Technique... Select Deathblow Techniques, then left, right, left, A!

source: バルガス 「うっががががっ！！ す すでにその技を…！！
translation: Unhgagagaga!! Th-that skill already...!!

source: {マッシュ} 「貴方のその おごりさえ なければ…師は……… {Mash}: If it weren't for that arrogance of yours... the master would... {SABIN}: If only you hadn't been in such a rush for power......
translation: If it weren't for that arrogance of yours... the master would...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「{マッシュ}！！
translation: {Mash}!!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「兄貴？
translation: Big bro?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「お…弟、ふたごの！？
translation: Y... your brother, the twin!?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「お…弟さん？ わ、私…てっきり大きな熊かと…。
translation: L... little brother? I... I could have sworn a large bear, or...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「熊ァ！？
translation: A bear!?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「熊か…そりゃあいい！
translation: Bear, huh... I like it!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「それより兄貴。 いったい何だってこんなとこに… {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「サーベル山脈に行くところだ。 {ﾏｯｼｭ}「もしや… 地下組織リターナーの本部？
translation: Anyhow, big bro. What are you up to in a place like this...? {Edgar}: We're on our way to the Sabre Mountains. {Mash}: Could that mean... the headquarters of the underground Returners organization?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「とうとう動きだすか！ かげながら冷や冷やして ながめていたぜ。 このままフィガロは帝国の犬として おとなしくしているのかってな。
translation: So you're finally making your move! I've been watching from the shadows, shuddering at what I've seen. I figured Figaro was going to keep on being the Empire's lapdog.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「反撃のチャンスが 来たんだ。 もうジイヤたちの顔色をうかがって 帝国にベッタリすることもない。
translation: Our chance has come to strike back. No more sucking up to the Empire or worrying about upsetting the old fogeys.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「俺の技もお役に 立てるかい？
translation: Could my skills help the cause?

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「来てくれるか？ {マッシュ}よ……
translation: You'll come with us? {Mash}...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「俺の技が世界平和の 役に立てばダンカン師匠も うかばれるだろうぜ！
translation: If my skills help with world peace, I'll bet Master Duncan will rest easier!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「さ 行こう！
translation: So let's go!

source: 「{マッシュ} 主人とバルガスは…？
translation: : {Mash}, what happened with my husband and Vargas...?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「先生はバルガスに… バルガスは…
translation: The master was... Vargas...

source: 「バルガスもなぜあんなことに…。 でも主人もあなたに奥技を残せて 思い残す事はないでしょう…。
translation: : Why would Vargas stoop to that...? But I'm sure my husband had no regrets since he left his secret arts to you...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「この１０年間 家族のようで楽しかった… お世話になりました…！
translation: These ten years were fun, like we were family... I owe you so much...!

source: 「{エドガー}様！ どうぞこちらへ。
translation: : {Edgar}-sama! Right this way.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「バナン様。 例の娘をつれてまいりました。
translation: Bannan-sama. We have brought the girl.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「ほう、この娘か… 氷づけの幻獣と反応したというのは。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「幻獣……？ {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「どうやらこの娘は 帝国にあやつられていたようです。
translation: Oh, this is the girl...? The one they say reacted to the icebound Genjuu. {Tina}: Genjuu...? {Edgar}: It seems as though this girl was being manipulated by the Empire.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「伝書鳥の知らせで、おおよそは 聞いておる。 帝国兵５０人をたったの３分で 皆殺しにしたとか…
translation: I've heard a rough overview through carrier pigeon notices. That she annihilated fifty Imperial soldiers in a mere three minutes, or some such...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「いやー！！
translation: NO!!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{ティナ}！ {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「バナン様ひどすぎます！
translation: {Tina}! {Edgar}: Bannan-sama, you're being too harsh!

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「逃げるな！
translation: Don't run from the truth!

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「こんな話を知っておるか？ まだ邪悪な心が人々の中に存在しない ころ、開けてはならないとされていた １つの箱があった。 だが、１人の男が箱を開けてしまった。 中から出たのは、あらゆる邪悪な心… しっと… ねたみ… 独占… 破壊… 支配… だが、箱の中に一粒の光が残っていた… 希望という名の光じゃ。
translation: Do you know of a story like this? When wicked hearts did not yet exist within people, there was a box that it was forbidden to open. But one man opened the box. From inside came all sorts of wicked hearts... Envy... resentment... possessiveness... destruction... domination... But a ray of light remained deep in the box... It was the light we call hope.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「…… ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「どんな事があろうと、自分の力を 呪われたものと考えるな。 おぬしは世界に残された最後の一粒。 「希望」と言う名の一粒の光じゃ。
translation: ...... Bannan: Whatever may happen, don't consider your own power to be a cursed thing. You are the last ray left to the world. The ray we call "hope".

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「バナン様！
translation: Bannan-sama!

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「つかれた… 休ませてもらうよ。
translation: I am wearied... You will allow me to rest.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「{ティナ}よ… みんなとよく相談してみてくれ。
translation: {Tina}... Talk things over well with everyone.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「俺は大事な人を帝国に 奪われた。俺が帝国を憎むように なったのはそれからだ。 帝国がこのままのさばれば 俺のような人間が増える一方だ。 だからリターナーに入った。
translation: I was deprived of someone important to me by the Empire. It's because of that I ended up hating it. If the Empire keeps having its way like this, there's just going to be more people like me. That's why I joined the Returners.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「でも…私には大事な人は いない… {ﾛｯｸ}「そんな事はないさ。 逆に、君を大事に思ってくれる人も いるかもしれない。 その人のためにも……
translation: But... I don't have anyone important to me... {Lock}: Sure you do. On the flip side, you might have people who think you're important to them. Think of those people too...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「{ティナ}にこんな事を たのむのはこくな事かもしれない。 われわれの考えを無理強いするのは 帝国のやり方となんら変わりの無い 事だからな。 だから…… {ティナ}自身に決めて欲しい。
translation: It may not be fair for us to ask such a thing of you, {Tina}. Forcing our ideas on you wouldn't be any different from the Empire's way of doing things. So... {Tina}, I want you to decide for yourself.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「俺にはよくわからない… だが昔から兄貴の言う事に間違いは 無かった。 いつも俺の事を思ってくれたからな。 {ティナ}も信用していいと思うぜ。
translation: I don't really get the situation... But I've never gone wrong listening to big bro since way back. It's because he was always thinking of me. I think you can trust him too, {Tina}.

source: おっと、こんな事俺が言ってるなんて 兄貴に言っちゃダメだぜ。 てれるからなー
translation: Whoa, don't go telling big bro I said something like this. It's embarrassing...

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「答えは出たかの？ われわれの最後に残された希望に なってくれるか？
translation: Have you reached an answer? Will you be our last remaining hope?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「そうか！！
translation: I see!!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「でも… 何だかこわい……
translation: But... I'm kind of scared...

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「おぬしが不安な気持ちになるのも 無理はない。 Bannan: It is not unreasonable that you would feel uneasy. BANON: The person who possesses this relic need not fear harm.
translation: It is not unreasonable that you would feel uneasy.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「{ティナ}よ… これを持ってゆくがよい。 Bannan: {Tina}... Take this with you. BANON: Please, {TERRA}... I'd like you to take it with you.
translation: {Tina}... Take this with you.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「これは… ？？？
ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「お守りじゃ。とっときなさい。 「ガントレット」 を手に入れた
translation: A charm. Take it with you. Got Gauntlet.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「みんなで力をあわせれば きっとうまく行くはず。 希望をすてないことじゃ。 Bannan: Everything ought to go well if we all work together. Don't abandon hope. BANON: If everyone works together we'll be successful. Never give up hope!
translation: Everything ought to go well if we all work together. Don't abandon hope.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「いい考えがあるんじゃ。 とにかくみんなを集めてくれんか。
translation: I have some good ideas. At any rate, would you gather everyone for me?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「誰じゃ？ こんなところに紙クズをすてたのは？
translation: Who did this? Who discarded a scrap of paper in a place like this?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「帝国が魔導の力を用い、戦争を 始めたのは皆も知っての通りだ。だが ガストラがどうやって魔導の力を復活 させたか？……ポイントはそこだ。
translation: As we all know, the Empire has used the power of sorcery to begin a war. But how has Gastra revived the power of sorcery? ...the important point lies there.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「{ロック}に調べて もらったんだが、ガストラは世界中の 学者を集めて、幻獣の研究を始めた らしいんだ。
translation: We've had {Lock} investigating, and it seems Gastra assembled scholars from around the world and began research into Genjuu.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ナルシェ攻撃も そのためだ。
translation: That's the reason behind the attack on Narshe, too.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「つまり魔導の力と 幻獣に何か関係があると…… ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「魔導と幻獣……この２つの言葉で 思い出される事は一つしかない……。
translation: So you're saying the power of sorcery and the Genjuu are somehow related...? Bannan: Sorcery and Genjuu... there is but one thing brought to mind by those two words...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「もしや…… ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「その通り。魔大戦じゃ。
translation: Could you mean... Bannan: Precisely. The Great Magic War.

source: 「おー 「まさか！
translation: : Oh! : It can't be!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「枕元でばあちゃんが 話してくれたのは… 本当の話だったのか？
translation: Those bedtime stories granny told me... They were true stories?

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「魔大戦の悲劇がまた くり返されると？ ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「わからん。もう１０００年も前の 話じゃ。歴史学者によって、それぞれ いろんな説があるからのう。 一説によると幻獣から力を取りだして 人間に注入させた、というが…。
translation: You're saying the tragedy of the Great Magic War will be repeated? Bannan: I can't say. It was 1000 years ago, you realize. There are a variety of theories, all differing from historian to historian. According to one theory, they extracted power from Genjuu and infused it into humans...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「それが魔導の力……
translation: And that's the power of sorcery...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「帝国に立ち向かうには こちらも魔導の力を手に入れるしか… ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「ならん！それでは魔大戦と同じ 間違いをする事になってしまう。 {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「…では、どうしろと？ ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「幻獣と話ができないかと考えて いるのだが、どうだ？ {ﾛｯｸ}「幻獣と！？
translation: To oppose the Empire, obtaining the power of sorcery ourselves is our only... Bannan: No! Then we would be making the same mistakes as in the Great Magic War. {Edgar}: ...then what are we supposed to do? Bannan: I've been wondering if we couldn't speak with the Genjuu. What about that? {Lock}: With the Genjuu!?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「危険だが…{ティナ}と 幻獣をもう一度反応させれば 幻獣がめざめるかもしれない。 {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「本当にそんな事が……
translation: It's dangerous... but if we could get {Tina} to react with the Genjuu again, the Genjuu might awaken. {Edgar}: Is that really such a...?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「たしかな事は言えないが… しかし…… これには{ティナ}の協力が必要だ。
translation: I can't say it's a sure thing... However... For this, we need {Tina}'s cooperation.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{ティナ}。
translation: {Tina}.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「やってみましょう。 {ﾏｯｼｭ}「何だかチンプンカンプン だが……面白そうだな。
translation: Let's try it. {Mash}: It's all as good as gibberish to me... but it sounds interesting.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「なんじゃ？ 今の物音は…
translation: What's that? Those noises just now...

source: た、大変です！ バナン様…
translation: T-terrible news! Bannan-sama...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「何てひどいケガ…
translation: What awful wounds...

source: サ、サウスフィガロが…
translation: S-South Figaro...

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「お、おい！どうした！？ 何があったんじゃ！？
translation: H-hey! What's wrong!? What happened!?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「そうか…
translation: I see...

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「やっぱりそうか…
translation: It's still like that...?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「どうしてもダメか…
translation: Is there no way...?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「希望…… 私…そんなものにはなれない…
translation: Hope... I... can't be something like that...

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「お、おい！どうした！？ 何があったんじゃ！？
translation: H-hey! What's wrong!? What happened!?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「何とひどいケガじゃ…
translation: What awful wounds...

source: サ、サウスフィガロが…
translation: S-South Figaro...

source: て、帝国がサウスフィガロから こちらへ向かっています…
translation: Th-the Empire is headed this way from South Figaro...

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「気づかれたか… 作戦を急がなくてはならん！！
translation: So we've been found out... We'll have to hasten our plans!!

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「{ロック}！ {ﾛｯｸ}「わかってる。 サウスフィガロで 内部から敵を足止めする作戦だろ？ {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「お前の特技を 見込んでの作戦だ！たのんだぞ。
translation: {Lock}! {Lock}: Got it. Use the "hold the enemy back from within" ploy in South Figaro, right? {Edgar}: The operation calls for your special skills. We're counting on you.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{ティナ}。 俺が戻るまでおとなしく待ってなよ。 特に…… 手が早いので有名などこかの王様には 気をつけろよ。 {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「{ロック}！
translation: {Tina}. Keep out of trouble while I'm away. In particular... be careful of a certain king who's infamous for his quick hands. {Edgar}: {Lock}!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「兄貴… まだそのクセ直ってないのかい？
translation: Big bro... you still haven't kicked that habit?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「こっちはどうする？ {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「レテ川を抜けて ナルシェに逃げるのがいいでしょう。 炭坑で見つかった幻獣の事も気に かかります。 ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「うむ。 では裏口にイカダを用意させよう。 少々危険だが、ほかに手はあるまい。
translation: What will we do? {Edgar}: Fleeing down Lethe River to Narshe should do the trick. I'm also concerned about the Genjuu they found in the coal mines. Bannan: Right. Then let's have a raft readied at the rear exit. It's risky, but I doubt we have much choice.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「ここは危険だ。 いっしょにナルシェへ……。 自分の力を知る、よいチャンスに なるかもしれんぞ。
translation: It's dangerous here. Come to Narshe with us... It might be a good chance for you to understand your powers.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「グズグズしてるヒマはない。 すぐナルシェに向かうぞ！
translation: There's no time to waste. We head for Narshe at once!

source: 不安な気持ちはわかります。 でも、こうしている間にたくさんの命が 帝国によって…… どうかわれわれに力をかしてください。 このアクセサリーがあなたを守って くれるはず。 「げんじのこて」 を手に入れた
translation: I understand your uneasy feelings. But even as we speak, many lives are falling victim to the Empire... Please, assist us. This accessory ought to protect you. Got Genji's Bracer.

source: うーん… うーん…
translation: Ungh... ungh...

source: うわー！！！！ 帝国が攻めてきたぞー！！！
translation: Waaah!!!! The Empire's attacking us!!!

source: 「何だ…。 ねごとか。
translation: : Oh... He's just talking in his sleep.

source: さあ！ このイカダでナルシェへ行こう！
translation: Come on! Let's take this raft to Narshe!

source: バナンを守りながら ナルシェに向かいます。 バナンが戦闘不能になった場合 ゲームオーバーとなります。
translation: You will head for Narshe as you protect Bannan. If Bannan is incapacitated, then it's Game Over.

source: 何だ、何だ？
translation: What's this, what's this?

source: うひょひょ ここは とおせんぼ！ とおさないよー イジワル イジワル？
translation: Uhyo hyo! I'm blocking your way here! I won't let you through... Meanie, meanie?

source: アッチッチーー！！ ゆでだこ！？ ゆでだこ！？
translation: Hot, hot, HOT!! Boiled octopus!? Boiled octopus!?

source: かわいい 女の子 わいのこのみや…… ポッ
translation: I have a thing for cute girls... *blush*

source: きんにくモリモリ……きらいだー！
translation: Brimming with muscles... hate you!

source: おまえのかお……こわーーい！！
translation: Your face... scaaaary!!

source: グェグェ…ガボガボガボ……
translation: Ghgh... glub glub glub...

source: {マッシュ} 「やったのか？
translation: Did we get it?

source: {エドガー} 「いや、てごたえがなかった…… 水中にもぐっただけかも……？！
translation: No, it didn't feel that way... Maybe it just dove underwater...!?

source: {ティナ} 「きゃっ！！ あしに 何かが！
translation: Eeek!! Something's on my leg!

source: {エドガー} 「{ティナ}！こっちだ！
translation: {Tina}! Over here!

source: バナン 「もうだいじょうぶじゃ
translation: You'll be all right now.

source: {マッシュ} 「ふざけやがって！ 必殺技で、ばらばらにしてやる！
translation: You dare mess with us!? I'll rip you to shreds with my Deathblows!

source: {エドガー} 「よせ！{マッシュ}！！
translation: {Mash}! Don't!!

source: {マッシュ} 「とめるな、兄貴！ おうりゃー！！！！！
translation: Don't stop me, big bro! OHRYAAA!!!!!

source: {エドガー} 「むちゃしやがって……
translation: Of all the damn fool...

source: {ティナ} 「{マッシュ}……
translation: {Mash}...

source: バナン 「なあに、心配はいらん！
translation: Hey now, no need to worry!

source: {エドガー} 「ほんとですか、バナン…… 様……
translation: Are you sure, Bannan... sama...?

source: バナン 「何を言っておる、そのことは 兄弟のおぬしが、一番よく知っ てるはずじゃ そのうち、元気よく飛びだし て来るじゃろう！
translation: What are you saying? You, his brother, ought to know better than any of us. I'll bet he'll come flying out full of energy any minute now!

source: {マッシュ} 「あーれー！
translation: Whaaaaa!?

source: {エドガー} 「元気よすぎたって感じかな…… ははっ……
translation: Seemed maybe too energetic... Ha hah...

source: {ティナ} 「{マッシュ}ーーーーっ！！
translation: {Mash}!!

source: {エドガー} 「{マッシュ}！！ あとは、自分でなんとかしろー！
translation: {Mash}!! Manage something on your own!

source: バナンを護衛しながら ナルシェに向かう {エドガー}と{ティナ}… ひとり急流にのみこまれた {マッシュ}… そして… 帝国をカク乱するために サウスフィガロに潜入した {ロック}… はたして３者の命運は…？
translation: {Edgar} and {Tina}, who escort Bannan as they head for Narshe... {Mash}, who is on his own, swallowed by the rapids... And... {Lock}, who snuck into South Figaro to disrupt the Empire... What lies in store for these three...?

source: シナリオを選んでクポ！
translation: Choose a scenario, kupo!

source: 帝国の魔の手から逃れるべく 急流の中をナルシェに向かうバナン {エドガー}、そして{ティナ}… ナルシェまであと少し……
translation: Bannan, {Edgar}, and {Tina} head to Narshe through the rapids to escape the Empire's clutches... Just a little farther to Narshe...

source: 「お前は…… この前の帝国兵士！？
translation: : You're... the Imperial solder from before!?

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「まってください！
translation: Please, wait!

source: 「出ていけ！ さもないと……！！
translation: : Get out! Or else...!!

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「まあ 待て。 私はフィガロ王{エドガー}… 「うそをつけ！
translation: Now, now, hold on. I'm Figaro's king, {Edgar}... : Lies!

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「やれやれ {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「男はこれだから 好きになれない。 聞く耳持たないって感じだな…… {ﾃｨﾅ}「ごめんなさい。私のせいで…
translation: Good grief. {Edgar}: That's just how men are, so I could never fall for one. It's like they don't have ears to listen... {Tina}: I'm sorry. It's my fault that...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「{ロック}に 助けてもらった時 たしかこのあたりから……
translation: When I got help from {Lock}, we came out around here, if I remember right...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「{ロック}に聞いている。 たぶん、このでっぱりをひねれば…
translation: I heard from {Lock}. I'll bet if we twist this bump...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「ここは… {ﾃｨﾅ}「なに？ {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「強者達が ナルシェのガードとして、やとって もらえるか、テストされる場所が あると聞いたことがある。たしか… あの光の後を追っていけば、無事に たどりつけるはず… もし間違えた時は 光にかこまれるが、赤い光を選べば 前に進める…
translation: This place... {Tina}: What? {Edgar}: I've heard that there's a place where the strong are tested to see if they can get a job as a Narshe guard. If I'm not mistaken... If we follow after that light, we should be able to get through safely... If we make a mistake, we'll be surrounded by lights, but can go on if we choose the red light...

source: ｼﾞｭﾝ「バナン様、{エドガー}様！ ほう、それに{ティナ}か！！
translation: Bannan-sama, {Edgar}-sama! Oh, and if it isn't {Tina}, too!!

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「ジュンよ。ナルシェのようすは どうじゃ？ ｼﾞｭﾝ「ここは帝国からもリターナー からも独立している町。 リターナーに加われと説得しても なかなか聞きません。 バナン様やフィガロ王が来てくれたと なれば、もしかしたら……
translation: Jun. How are things looking in Narshe? Jun: The city here maintains independence from both the Empire and the Returners. I've been urging them to join the Returners, but they aren't listening. Perhaps now that people like you and King Figaro have come here...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「住民の様子は？ ｼﾞｭﾝ「炭坑の幻獣を見て、みな 不安がっています。
translation: How are the citizens? Jun: Everyone seems uneasy at seeing a Genjuu in the coal mines.

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「この子がその幻獣についての 答を導き出してくれるかも しれんのだ。 ｼﾞｭﾝ「住民も幻獣の正体を知りたがって いる事には変わりない。説得の しかたによっては{ティナ}を 受け入れてくれるかもしれません…
translation: This girl might coax out some answers for us concerning that Genjuu. Jun: The citizens are no different when it comes to wanting to know the truth about the Genjuu. If we go about convincing them the right way, they might accept {Tina}...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「幻獣は、われわれにとって 救世主となるのか…… それとも地獄からの使者となるのか？
translation: Will the Genjuu be a savior to us... or an envoy from hell?

source: サウスフィガロの帝国軍の 足止めに成功した{ロック}だが… そのきびしい警戒の前に 逃げ道を失っていた…
translation: {Lock} succeeded in holding back the Imperial army in South Figaro... But faced with their relentless vigilance, he has lost his escape route...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「くっそー 早くナルシェに行かなきゃ……
translation: Shit. Gotta get to Narshe quick...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「いてて… ふりだしにもどる……か
translation: Ow, ow, ow... Guess I'm back to square one...

source: ぼくのおじいちゃんは昔北の家の金持ち のめし使いをやっていたんだ。
translation: My grandpa used to be a servant for the rich man in the northern house.

source: でも今は商人しか通しちゃだめって 言われているんだ。
translation: But for now I've been told not to let anyone through but merchants.

source: 商人「お前は悪名高いドロボウ {ロック}だな？ {ﾛｯｸ}「おっと トレジャーハンターと言ってくれ。
translation: You're the infamous thief {Lock}, aren't you? {Lock}: Whoa, there, call me a treasure hunter.

source: ついでに服を盗んだ！！
translation: Took the chance to steal his clothes!!

source: ロック 「あーら、よっと！
translation: Aha, gotcha!

source: 「ちょっと小さいけど まあいいか
translation: It's a bit small, but whatever.

source: ヒ、ヒィーーーー！！
translation: E-eeeeep!!

source: 商人さんだね？ 通っていいよ。
translation: Merchant, right? You can pass.

source: 下っぱの兵はよわっちいくせに すぐケンカをふっかけてくるんだ。 スキが多いから服まで盗めちまう。
translation: The underling soldiers are quick to pick fights in spite of what wusses they are. They're so careless you could even steal their clothes.

source: 何だお前は！ 帰った帰った！！
translation: What's your problem!? Go home already!!

source: ちょっと大きめ しょうがないか
translation: It's a bit on the large side, but I guess it can't be helped.

source: あの有名な女将軍が帝国を裏切った らしいぜ。 この町のどこかに閉じ込められて いるって話だぜ。
translation: I head that famous woman general betrayed the Empire. Word is she's locked up somewhere in this town.

source: しまった！ 北のやしきの地下の抜け道の見張り の時間だ。 え～い いいや。 ここまできたらやめらんねえ。
translation: Dammit! It's time to guard the secret underground passage in the northern mansion. Eh, screw it. It's too late to stop now.

source: 北のやしきには２つ抜け道があるって 聞いたぜ。 １つは町の外へ、もう一つはどっかの 家だって。
translation: I've heard the northern mansion has two secret passages. One goes out of town, the other to a house somewhere.

source: 今ごろは別動隊がナルシェに 向かっているはず。 すぐ合流するぞ。
translation: Around now a detached force should be heading for Narshe. We'll join up with them soon.

source: ケフカのヤロウが そろそろナルシェを攻撃するころだな。 もっとも目の前ではケフカさま…… としか呼べないがな。
translation: That Cefca scumbag's about to attack Narshe. Of course, to his face, it's Cefca-sama... Can't call him anything else.

source: 時間か？ すまんな。
translation: It's time? Thanks.

source: なんでい？ おれの酒を盗みに来たのか？
translation: What the? You here to steal my sake?

source: え～い こそどろめ。
translation: Grrrr, you damn sneak-thief.

source: おー酒じゃ。 グビッ グビッ ん？抜け道を知りたいじゃと？ うむ、確かに北のやしきには秘密の地下 道があるはずじゃ。
translation: Ohh, sake. *gulp*, *gulp* Hm? You want to find an escape route? Hmm, yes, the northern mansion should have a secret underground path.

source: 下の階でまごに合言葉を言ってみい。 合言葉は ……？ 忘れたわい。
translation: Tell my grandson downstairs the password. The password's ...? I forgot!

source: 合言葉は…… 「のばら」 「ゆうき」 「ざせつ」
translation: The password is... "wild rose" "courage" "frustration"

source: ひみつの いりぐち。
translation: Secret entrance.

source: グーだね。
translation: Good luck.

source: ああ、私はなんて事をして しまったんだ…… 金に目がくらんで帝国に情報を流して しまうなんて。
translation: Oh, what have I done...? How could I have been so blinded by money that I leaked information to the Empire?

source: （変装をとるか？） （この格好も気に入ったな。）
translation: (Take my disguise off?) (I kinda like this look.)

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「あいつ 見たことがある…… 帝国の将軍……たしか…
translation: I've seen her before... If I'm right... she's an Imperial general...

source: 「裏切り者はこうなるんだ！
translation: : This is what becomes of traitors!

source: 帝国の英才教育によって人工的に うみ出された魔導戦士 いくたの戦を切り抜けてきた将軍の 女としての素顔を見た者は誰もいない
translation: A Battle Sorceress produced artificially through Imperial Special Education. None have looked upon the true self as a woman of this general who has fought countless battles.

source: 「常勝将軍{セリス}も 落ちたもんだな。
translation: : How far the invincible General {Celes} has fallen.

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「弱者を力でふみつぶす お前たちほどとは思わんがな… 「なにっ！
translation: But not, I think, so far as you, who trample the weak by force... : What!

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「ケフカは東方の国 ドマを毒を用いて皆殺しにする計画を しているそうじゃないか 「うるさい！
translation: Didn't I hear Cefca is planning on using poison to massacre the eastern country of Doma? : Shut up!

source: 「チッ。明日はどうせ処刑されるんだ。 今のうちにへらず口を たたいてるんだな！
translation: : Tch. You'll be executed tomorrow anyway. Run your mouth off now while you still can!

source: しっかり見はれよ！
translation: Keep a close watch on her!

source: ハッ！三日三晩、眠らずに見はります！
translation: Yes, sir! I could stand guard three days and nights without sleep!

source: （クサリをはずしてやるか） （このままながめてるのもいいか）
translation: (Guess I'll remove her chains) (Maybe I'll just keep taking in the view)

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「お前は…
translation: You're...?

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「こんな所まで押し売り？ {ﾛｯｸ}「おっとこんな格好で失礼。
translation: Pushing your wares in a place like this? {Lock}: Whoops, sorry about the getup.

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「兵士にしてはずいぶん せが低いわね。 {ﾛｯｸ}「おっと、ユニフォームを 着てたんだっけ。
translation: You're awfully short for a soldier. {Lock}: Whoops, forgot I was wearing a uniform.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「リターナーにくみする者。 {ロック}。 {ｾﾘｽ}「リターナー！そうか… 私は{セリス}将軍…だった… 今はただの裏切り者。
translation: I'm {Lock}, with the Returners. {Celes}: Returners! I see... I'm General {Celes}... or was... Now I'm just a traitor.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「行くぞ！ {ｾﾘｽ}「！？ 私を連れてか？
translation: Let's go! {Celes}: !? You're taking me with you?

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「いいや無理だ。 走ることができない…
translation: Don't bother, it's no good. I can't even run...

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「ありがとう… だが、かりにお前が私を連れ出しても 守りきれるはずがない… それならば ここでいさぎよく死をむかえたほうが
translation: Thanks... But even if you DID get me out, you'd never be able to protect me the whole way... In that case, bravely facing death here is more my—

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「守る！
translation: I'll protect you!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「俺が守ってみせる！
translation: I swear I'll protect you!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「行くぞ！
translation: Let's go!

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「待て。
translation: Wait.

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「脱出に役立つ物を この兵士が持っているかも。
translation: This solder might have something that will help in our escape.

source: 兵士「ハヤシライスも……
translation: And hashed beef with rice...

source: 兵士「カレーライスがたべたい むにゃ むにゃ ……
translation: Wanna eat some curry rice. mumble mumble ......

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「どうして私を守ると……？ {ﾛｯｸ}「似てるんだ……
translation: Why say you'll protect me...? {Lock}: You resemble...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「いや、なんでもない。 俺自身のためさ。
translation: No, it's nothing. I'm doing it for my own sake.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「さっきから何の音だ？
translation: What's that noise I keep hearing?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「何だ？ {ｾﾘｽ}「壁の中から何か来る！
translation: What the? {Celes}: Something's coming out of the wall!

source: {セリス} 「ディッグアーマーだ！ コイツの魔法をあびれば、 あとかたもないはず！！
translation: Dig Armor! Getting hit by its magic is supposed to obliterate you!!

source: {ロック} 「どうすりゃいい？
translation: What should we do?

source: {セリス} 「魔法は、まふうけんで、私が ひきよせる！
translation: I'll draw off the magic with Magicseal Sword!

source: {ロック} 「そんなことして、 だいじょうぶなのか？
translation: Will you be okay, doing something like that?

source: {セリス} 「まあ、みていなさい！！
translation: Watch and you'll see!!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ふう、やっと ふりきれたようだな。
translation: Whew, looks like we finally shook them off.

source: オルトロスとの戦いの末、イカダから なげ出された{マッシュ} はたして行く手には何が…
translation: At the end of the battle with Orthros, {Mash} was thrown from the raft. What lies along his way...?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「旅の者か？ 仲間とはぐれてしまった。 ナルシェに行きたいのだが どう行けばいいか知らないか？
translation: You a traveler? I got separated from my companions. I want to get to Narshe. Do you know which way I should go?

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「東の森を抜けたところに 帝国が陣をはっているらしい。 {ﾏｯｼｭ}「帝国が！？ {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「どうやらドマの城を ねらっているような気配だ。 {ﾏｯｼｭ}「ドマの城か…。 でも俺は急いでナルシェに 行かなければならないんだ。 {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「ナルシェへ行くには ドマを抜けるしか道はない。 俺がドマへ案内してやっても いいんだがな。 ただし、気が変わったら いつでも俺は抜けるからな。
translation: Seems the Empire's set up a base past the eastern forest. {Mash}: The Empire!? {Shadow}: I'm getting the impression they're after Doma Castle. {Mash}: Doma Castle, huh...? But I've got to hurry up and get to Narshe. {Shadow}: You can't get to Narshe from here unless you pass through Doma. I wouldn't mind guiding you. On the condition that I can leave any time if I change my mind.

source: 男「東の森を抜けたところに 帝国が陣をはっているらしい。 {ﾏｯｼｭ}「帝国が！？ 男「どうやらドマの城をねらっている ような気配だ。 {ﾏｯｼｭ}「ドマの城か…。 でも俺は急いでナルシェに 行かなければならないんだ。 男「ナルシェへ行くにはドマを抜ける しか道はない。 俺がドマへ案内してやっても いいんだが。 ただし、気が変わったら いつでも俺は抜けるからな。
translation: Seems the Empire's set up a base past the eastern forest. {Mash}: The Empire!? Man: I'm getting the impression they're after Doma Castle. {Mash}: Doma Castle, huh...? But I've got to hurry up and get to Narshe. Man: You can't get to Narshe from here unless you pass through Doma. I wouldn't mind guiding you. On the condition that I can leave any time if I change my mind.

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「俺はいつでも死神に 追われている。
translation: I'm constantly being tailed by Death.

source: じじい「おっ！？
translation: Oh!?

source: じじい「時計の修理屋かい？ だいぶ待ったぞい。
translation: Clock repairman? I've waited quite a long time.

source: 『いや。 俺は修理屋なんかじゃない。
translation: "Nope. I'm no repairman."

source: じじい「ほれ、そこの壁にかかっておる じゃろ？もう何年も動いとらんのだ。 １年…？５年？いや１０年かのう？
translation: Look, it's on the wall there, right? Hasn't run in years now. One...? Five? No, maybe ten years?

source: じじい「おお、そうか！
translation: Oh, that's it!

source: じじい「芝かり機の修理屋か。 あんたのサービスが悪いから 表の庭は芝がボウボウじゃい。 １５メートルもノビちまったぞ。
translation: Lawnmower repairman? The front yard's a total mess thanks to your lousy service. It's grown a good 50 feet!

source: じじい「コラ、修理屋！ 早く、そのストーブを直してくれ！ さむくてさむくてタマらんわい！
translation: See here, repairman! Hurry up and fix that stove! It's so cold, so cold I can't take it!

source: 『あちちちち！
translation: "Hot, hot, hot, hot!"

source: 『まったく…… 子供のイタズラじゃあるまいし…
translation: "Good grief... This's worse than a kid's pranks..."

source: じじい「こども？ うー ワシには子供などおらん！ あー ぞっとする。 変な事を言わんでくれ！ さあ出ていけ。 いいかげんにしないとキサマも 獣ケ原にほうり出すぞ！！ 『？？？ どうかしてるぞ……このオヤジ。
translation: Kid? Oooh, I ain't got no kids! Ahh, you're giving me the chills. Don't talk about that stuff! Go on, get out. If you don't behave I'll toss you out on the Beast Plain too!! "??? This geezer's messed up..."

source: じじい「はて……？ だとすると…
translation: Oh...? Then that means...

translation: The bed repairman!? It's creaking like nobody's business!

source: そういえば… こないだ南の獣ケ原へ行ったら へんなガキを見かけたぞ。 あそこを通る時は注意せんとな。
translation: Come to think of it... I spotted some weird kid when I went to the Beast Plain south of here the other day. Gotta be on guard when you go through there.

source: 『これが帝国の陣地……。 かなり兵士が多いぞ…
translation: "This is an Imperial base... There's an awful lot of soldiers..."

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「な、なんだ……？？ 帝国兵がたくさんいるぞ！？
translation: Wh-what the...?? Tons of Imperial soldiers!?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「帝国相手じゃ ２人でも危険だぞ。
translation: Taking on the Empire would be risky even with the both of us.

source: 兵士Ａ「おい、知ってるか？ 兵士Ｂ「ああ、あの話か？ 兵士Ａ「しーっ…。 声が大きいぞ。 ケフカにでも見つかったら大変だぞ。
translation: Hey, have you heard? Soldier B: Yeah, that rumor? Soldier A: Shhh... Your voice is too loud. It would suck if we got caught by someone like Cefca.

source: 兵士Ａ「どうもあいつはレオ将軍を 我が軍から追い出して自分が将軍に なろうと、たくらんでるらしい。 兵士Ｂ「ジョウダンじゃないよ。 あんなヤツが将軍になるんだったら 実家に帰らしてもらうよ、ホントに。
translation: I hear that guy's plotting to drive General Leo out of our army and become general himself. Soldier B: You've gotta be kidding me. If someone like THAT becomes general, I'm leaving and won't take no for an answer.

source: 兵士Ａ「しーっ！ …もしあいつに聞こえたらどうする？ ろうやにブチ込まれちまうぞ！ 兵士Ｂ「…わかった、わかった。
translation: Shhh! ...what if he heard you? You'd get tossed in jail! Soldier B: ...yeah, yeah, I know.

source: 兵士Ｂ「…おっ！？ヤバイっ。 おいでなすったよ…。 早く持ち場に戻ろうぜ。
translation: ...huh!? Crap. Here comes trouble... Let's hurry and get back in position.

source: ｹﾌｶ「おい、コラ！ おまえらキチンと見張ってるか、ん？ 兵士Ａ「ははっ。 これはこれは ケフカ様ではございませぬか。 ごきげんはいかがでございましょう？ ｹﾌｶ「ふんっ。 あいさつなどどうでもいい！ いいか？ちゃんと見張ってなかったら ひどい目に会わしてやるからな！
translation: Hey, you there! You keeping a good watch, hm? Soldier A: Yes, sir. What a surprise, if it isn't Cefca-sama. How are you today? Cefca: Hmph. I don't give a damn about your greetings! Got it? If you're not keeping a proper lookout I'll make sure you suffer for it!

source: 兵士Ｂ「ふんっ！ 誰がお前の言う事なんか聞いて やるもんか。 兵士Ｂ「…まったく何だろうね。 あいつにゃレオ将軍のツメのアカでも のましてやりたいよ、ホントに。
translation: Hmph! Like hell anyone's gonna listen to you. Soldier B: ...jeez, what's his problem. I'd like to feed him the grime off General Leo's nails, seriously.

source: 兵士Ａ「しーっ！！！ だから声がデカいって言ってるだろ！ …まったく、お前は。 兵士Ａ「いいか？ あのケフカの野郎は レオ将軍みたいに人間のできた方とは 違うんだから注意しないと大変だぞ。 兵士Ｂ「ああ。まったくだ。
translation: Shhhh!!! I told you, your voice is too loud! ...jeez, you're hopeless. Soldier A: Got it? That Cefca scumbag hasn't got the humanity General Leo does, so you're screwed if you're not careful. Soldier B: Yeah. Seriously.

source: 帝国軍隊長「おいっ！そこの２人！ これよりドマ城に対し突撃を行う。 ２人とも突撃隊に加われ。今すぐだ！
translation: Hey! You two there! We're launching an assault on Doma Castle. You two join the attack force. At once!

source: 帝国軍隊長「突撃ィ！ Imperial Army Commander: Attack! COMMANDER: Attack!
translation: Attack!

source: ドマ兵「ダメです！ ふせぎきれません。

source: ドマ兵「これまでか…

source: 「またれよ！

source: 「ここはせっしゃにおまかせあれ！

source: おのれの主君に忠誠をちかい 王国のために剣をふるう異国の戦士 信ずるものを守るためなら 死をも恐れぬ勇気を持つ男……
translation: Warrior of a foreign country, who swears loyalty to his liege and wields sword for kingdom's sake. A man with the courage to fear not even death if to protect that which he believes in...

source: ドマ兵「{カイエン}殿は 敵の隊長をたおして下さい！

translation: I am the warrior {Cayenne} who serves Doma Kingdom!! Now, face me in an honest fight!

source: 帝国兵「隊長がやられた！ 逃げろー！！

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「ろうじょうして、敵が つかれるのをまつでござる。

translation: General Leo. Doma's people are set for a siege battle. Leo: So, they're bringing their tactical specialty.

source: 兵士「将軍。 城を攻める心がまえはできています。 いつでも命令を下してくだされば… ﾚｵ「そうあせるな。 もし今ドマ城に攻め込んだとしても ムダなギセイを多くはらうだけだ。
translation: General. We have the resolve to attack the castle. Any time you give the order... Leo: Don't be in such a hurry. Even if we fought our way into Doma Castle now, we'd just pay for it in pointless sacrifices.

source: 兵士「しかし、将軍。 帝国のためなら私はいつでも命を 落とすかくごはできています。
translation: But, general. I am prepared to lay down my life at any time if it will serve the Empire.

source: ﾚｵ「お前はマランダ出身だな？ 兵士「は？ は、はい。しかしなぜ？
translation: You're from Maranda, right? Soldier: What? Y-yes. But why?

source: ﾚｵ「国には家族もいるだろう。 この私にお前の剣を持って 家族の所へ行けというのか？ その時私はどんな顔をすればいい？ お前は帝国軍の兵士である以前に 一人の人間だ。ムダに命を落とすな。 ガストラ皇帝もきっとそうお望みだ。
translation: You have family back home, right? Are you telling me to carry your sword back to your family? How am I supposed to face them then? You're a person before you're a soldier in the Imperial army. Don't waste your life. I'm sure Emperor Gastra would agree.

source: 兵士「はい！
translation: Yes!

source: 兵士「レオ将軍！

source: 兵士「ガストラ皇帝からの伝書鳥です。
translation: A carrier pigeon from Emperor Gastra.

source: ﾚｵ「何…？
translation: What...?

source: ﾚｵ「皇帝がお呼びのようだ。 私は先に本国に帰る事にする。
translation: It seems the Emperor calls for me. I'll be returning to the homeland early.

source: 兵士「ははっ。承知しました。
translation: Understood, sir.

source: ﾚｵ「よし。あとの事は すべてお前たちにまかせたぞ。 兵士「はっ。 ﾚｵ「いいか。 くれぐれも早まったマネだけは せんようにな。たのんだぞ。
translation: Okay. I'm leaving it to you guys to finish things up here. Soldier: Yes, sir. Leo: Listen. Whatever you do, just don't rush things. I'm counting on you.

source: 兵士「はっ。 あとはおまかせ下さい。
translation: Yes, sir. Please leave the rest to us.

source: ﾚｵ「うむ。たのんだぞ。
translation: Right. I'm counting on you.

source: 『レオ将軍か…… 敵とはいえ、なかなか分別のある男の ようだな。
translation: "General Leo... Enemy or not, he seems like a remarkably sensible man."

source: ｹﾌｶ「レオ将軍がいなくなったら この川の水を毒に変えてやる… ふれただけで即死じゃあ…ヒッヒッ…
translation: I'll turn this river's water to poison as soon as General Leo's gone... Death at the slightest touch... hee, hee...

source: ﾚｵ「皇帝からお呼びがかかった。 私は先に本国に帰る。 くれぐれも間違いは起こさぬ事だ。 ｹﾌｶ「お前さんよりもてっとりばやく やってやるよ。
translation: A summons has come from the Emperor. I'm leaving for the homeland early. I urge you not to commit any mistakes. Cefca: I'll get it done quicker and easier than you.

source: ﾚｵ「ひれつなマネだけはするなよ。 敵兵と言えども同じ人間。 そこを忘れないでくれ。 ｹﾌｶ「リターナーに属す国などに 情けの心はいらんわ！ もっとも最初からそんなもんは 持ち合わせて無いがなっ！
translation: Just don't use foul play. Enemy soldiers or not, they're as human as us. Don't forget that part. Cefca: We don't need any sympathy for lands connected with the Returners! Though its not like I had anything like that handy to begin with!

source: ｹﾌｶ「いい子ぶりやがって。ふんっ！

translation: Is the poison ready? Soldier: But General Leo said no poison... Cefca: He's not here anymore. I'm top rank. Hand it over! Soldier: There are prisoners from our army in Doma Castle, too. If they drink the water... Cefca: I don't care! Who needs idiots dumb enough to get captured by the enemy!?

source: 『そうは行かないぞ！！

translation: {Cayenne}! King Doma: Ah... Yes... My eyes are in such a state, I can't even see your face... {Cayenne}: Your majesty! Your majesty! Please, be strong! King Doma: {Cayenne}... You have protected our Doma Kingdom since my father's time... I give you my thanks. ...ghf! I'm sorry... I couldn't protect the country to the end...

translation: Speak not such nonsense! King Doma: I worry for your families... Urrgh... can't breathe... chest burning... {Cayenne}: Strain not yourself! You must speak not! King Doma: Go to your family... ...kh, kh ...... {Cayenne}: Your majesty!!

{ｶｲｴﾝ}「そ、そんな… バカ…な……

translation: No need for thanks. I'm {Mash} from the country of Figaro. Let's get out of here for now.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「しかし…せっしゃは 家族や国の者たちのかたきを… {ﾏｯｼｭ}「ちょっと待った。 このままでは多勢に無勢。 グズグズしてたら、また敵の大群が…
translation: But... vengeance for my family, my countrymen... {Mash}: Hold on a minute. We're severely outnumbered here. Wait around and another enemy swarm...

translation: Sir {Mash}! How on earth doth one move this!?

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「{マッシュ}殿ー！ あべこべでござるぞー！！！

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「わかったわかった。 とにかく俺についてこいよー！

source: まんまと逃げるつもりだろうが そうはいかんぞ！！

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「ここまで来たら こっちのもんだ。 ところで、ここからナルシェには どうやって行けばいいんだ？ {ｶｲｴﾝ}「ナルシェでござるか。 ここからでは、南の森を抜けるしか なさそうでござるが…
translation: Things should go our way now that we've made it this far. By the way, which way should I go from here to get to Narshe? {Cayenne}: Narshe, thou sayest. From here, it doth seem there be naught save to pass through the southern forest...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「よしっ！ そうと決まったら、こんなガラクタに 用はない。行こう！

source: {カイエン} 「くそっ！後ろに回り込まれたか！

source: {カイエン} 「すまん！ だが、このままではまずい いったんひこう
translation: My thanks! But this smacks of trouble, so let us draw back for now.

source: {シャドウ} 「あばよ……

translation: A train at the platform!? I can scarce believe that a Doma rail line yet remaineth, not swallowed in the flames of war... {Mash}: There might be survivors. Let's try taking a look.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「{マッシュ}殿！

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「心配するなって。
translation: I'm telling you, don't worry about it.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「{マッシュ}殿！
translation: Sir {Mash}!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「なんだ、ここは？
translation: What's with this place?

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「出るでござる！ これは魔列車ですぞ！！
translation: Disembark! This be the Grim Train!!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「動き出した！？ {ｶｲｴﾝ}「はやく出なければ！
translation: It's started moving!? {Cayenne}: Needs we must leave quickly!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「開かねえ！
translation: It won't open!

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「おそかったでござるか。
translation: Then we be too late.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「この列車は？
translation: What's up with this train?

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「これは魔列車… 死んだ人間のたましいを、霊界へと 送りとどける列車でござる。
translation: This be the Grim Train... the train that delivereth the souls of those who died unto the spirit world.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「…待てよ。 ってェ事は、俺達も霊界とやらに 案内されちまうって事か？ {ｶｲｴﾝ}「このまま乗り続ければ、 そういう事になるでござる。
translation: ...hold on. So does that mean we're gonna be guided to that spirit whatever too? {Cayenne}: An we continue on riding, such will come to pass.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「そんなのごめんだぜ！ おりられないとなれば 列車を止めるしかないだろう。 とりあえず最前両の機関車へ！
translation: No thanks to that! If we can't get off, I guess there's no choice but to stop the train. So, to the locomotive up front!

source: 車掌「わたしがこの列車の車掌です。 どのようなご用事でしょう？
translation: I am this train's conductor. What brings you here?

source: 車掌「魔列車は、死んだ人のたましいを 霊界に運ぶために運行しています。 魔列車に乗ったたましいは霊界に 運ばれた後永遠の安息を得るのです。
translation: The Grim Train runs to carry the souls of the dead to the spirit world. Once the souls on the Grim Train are carried there, they gain their eternal rest.

source: 車掌「列車の止めかたですか？ 機関室をくまなく調べれば おわかりになりますよ。
translation: How to stop the train? Look around the engine room and you'll figure it out.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「時刻表でござるか？ {ﾏｯｼｭ}「どれどれ… なんだ、ぜんぶ白紙じゃないか。
translation: A timetable? {Mash}: Let's see... Huh, it's all blank.

source: 車掌「この列車は、死んだもの達を 霊界に案内する魔列車です。 争いに満ちた今の世の中では、 時刻表など、とても作れません。
translation: This is the Grim Train that guides the dead to the spirit realm. There's too much war in the world these days to possibly draw up a timetable.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「なんだ、これ？ 引っ張ってみようか。
translation: What's this? Let's try flipping it.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「{マッシュ}殿！ いじり回さないほうがよいでござる。
translation: Sir {Mash}! Best not to tinker with anything.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「引っ張っちゃったもんね～。
translation: There, flipped it!

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「な、なんと！？
translation: Wh-what!?

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「まったく、もう…
translation: Good grief...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「……、{カイエン}。 もしかして怖いのか？
translation: ...{Cayenne}. Don't tell me you're scared?

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「な、なにをおっしゃる！ 別にせっしゃが機械が苦手なもんで、 なるたけ機械とは関わりたくない、 などと考えているワケではござらぬゾ。 いや、ホントに。
translation: Wh-what speakest thou! 'Tis not as if I wish to avoid getting involved with machinery whenever possible because I cannot cope with it or any such nonsense. Nay indeed.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「{カイエン}… おまえ、機械が苦手だったんだ。
translation: {Cayenne}... You're no good with machines, huh.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「うっ！ な、なぜわかったのでござるか！？
translation: Urk! H-how coudst thou tell!?

source: …に、が、さ、ん……
translation: ...won't... let... you... escape...

source: 『ハアハア… なんだったんだ、いったい。
translation: "*pant*, *pant*... What was that all about?"

source: …に、が、さ、ん……
translation: ...won't... let... you... escape...
: Hm?

source: 『なんだ、この声は？
translation: "What's up with these voices?"

source: 『こっちから聞こえてくるぞ
translation: "I'm hearing them from over here."

source: …に、が、さ、ん……
translation: ...won't... let... you... escape...

source: 『げっ！ 追ってきやがった。
translation: "Geh! Dammit, they're following us."

source: …に、が、さ、ん……
translation: ...won't... let... you... escape...

source: 『こっちにも！
translation: "Over here too!"

source: 逃がすな…… 逃がすな…… 逃がすな……
translation: Don't let them escape... Don't let them escape... Don't let them escape...

source: 『しつこいやつらめ！
translation: "They're damn stubborn!"

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「いきどまりでござる！
translation: 'Tis a dead end!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「よし！ {ｶｲｴﾝ}「何かよい考えでも？
translation: Okay! {Cayenne}: A good notion, mayhap?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「おうよ！ 今こそ、しゅぎょうのせいかを みせるとき！ こい、{カイエン}！
translation: Oh, yeah! Now's the time to show the fruits of my training! Come on, {Cayenne}!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「うおおおおお！
translation: Graaaaah!

source: …に、が、さ、ん……
translation: ...won't... let... you... escape...

source: 『おい… 『もしかして…
translation: "Hey..." "Could they be...?"

source: 『しつこいやつらめ！
translation: "They're damn stubborn!"

source: 『後ろの車両を切りはなさなくては。
translation: "We must detach the rear cars."

source: 『これならもう追ってこられないな。
translation: "Now they can't follow anymore."

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「メシだ、メシだ！ 山ほどもってこ～い！
translation: Food, food! Bring me mountains of it!

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「こ、こんなもの食べて、 だいじょうぶなのでござろうか？
translation: W-wilt be all right, eating such things?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「心配なのか？ ま、いいんじゃないの。 ハラがへってはイクサはできんよ。
translation: Worried? Hey, it's no big deal. Can't wage war on an empty stomach.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「うーむ… せっしゃは、どうもこういう話は 苦手でござる。まったく…
translation: Hmm... Such talk as this is no strong point of mine. Confound it all...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「さて！ たらふく食ったし、行くとするか！
translation: Now! We've eaten up, so how about we get going!

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「…… インターセプター、お前も食べるか？
translation: ...... Interceptor, will you eat too?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「さ～て！ メシだ、メシだ！ たらふくたべるぞ！
translation: Come on! Food, food! I'm gonna eat my heart out!

source: 男の声「ちょいと待ちな！
translation: Just a minute!

source: ｼﾞｰｸﾌﾘｰド「オレさまは、世界一の剣士 ジークフリード。 そこにあるお宝はオレさまのもんだ。 さ、ジジイとキンニクだるまは、 帰った、帰った！
translation: I am Siegfried, the world's greatest swordsman. The treasure there is mine. Now, geezer and musclehead, get lost, get lost!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「世界一の剣士様？ そっちこそケガしないうちに帰りな。 ｼﾞｰｸﾌﾘｰド「なにっ！ キンニクだるまのぶんざいで！ オレさまの剣のサビにしてくれる！
translation: World's greatest swordsman? Get lost yourself before you get hurt. Siegfried: What! How dare you, musclehead! I'll reduce you to rust on my sword!

source: いくぞ！ こわっぱども！！ うりゃりゃりゃーー！！
translation: Here we go! You little twerps!! Uryaryaryaa!!

source: ぜえ ぜえ ぜえ ど、どうだ！ まいったか！！
translation: *gasp* *gasp* *gasp* H-how's that! Give up!?

source: 『くちほどにもないヤツだな。
translation: "His bark's worse than his bite."

source: ｼﾞｰｸﾌﾘｰド「く、くそ！ しかーし！ 最後にわらうのはこのオレだあ！
translation: C-crap! However! The one who laughs last is me!

source: ｼﾞｰｸﾌﾘｰド「ふはははは。 このお宝はオレさまがいただくぜ。 アディオス アミーゴ！
translation: Huhahahaha. I'll be taking this treasure. Adios, amigos!

source: 『行ってしまうのか？
translation: "You're leaving?"

source: 『ここからは、俺達だけか…
translation: "Guess it's just us from here..."

source: 『ここが機関車の制ぎょ室か。 はやく列車を止めないと…
translation: "This is the engine control room. Gotta stop the train quick..."

source: 『ん？ なにか書いてあるな。 なになに？ 機関車を止めるには、第一、第三番 圧力べんを止め、えんとつの横にある ていしスイッチをおしてください？
translation: "Hm? Something's written here. What's this? To stop the engine, shut off the first and third pressure valves, then press the kill switch next to the smokestack?"

source: 『このスイッチをおせば、列車は 止まるはずだ。
translation: "The train should stop if we push this switch."

source: 魔列車「私の走行を邪魔するのは お前達か！
translation: So, you're the ones who are hindering my travels!

source: 魔列車「お前達はおろしてやろう… だがその前に、やらねばならぬ 事がある…
translation: I shall let you off... But there is something I must do before that...

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「ついたようでございる。
translation: We seem to have arrived.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「やーれ、やれ。 やっとおりられたぜ。
translation: Yeesh. Finally made it off.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「こんな列車とは、 はやいとこ、おサラバしようぜ。
translation: Let's hurry up and say good riddance to this train.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「あれは……！？ ミナ！ シュン！！
translation: There...!? Mina! Shun!!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「{カイエン}！ お前の奥さんと息子さんか！？
translation: {Cayenne}! Are those your wife and son!?

source: 『出発するのか！？ "Departing!?" Departing!?
translation: "Departing!?"

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「まってくれ！
translation: Wait!

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「ミナ！！
translation: Mina!!

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「シュン……
translation: Shun...

source: あなた…… しあわせだったわ。 ありがとう……
translation: Darling... I had every happiness with you. Thank you...

source: パパ！ ぼく、がんばって剣のけいこをして ママを守るよ！！
translation: Daddy! I'm gonna keep at my sword training and protect mommy!!

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「そっとしておいてやれ。
translation: Leave him be.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「これがバレンの滝か…
translation: So this is Baren Falls...

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「これより南は獣ケ原… 凶悪な獣がいる危険な場所ですぞ。 {ﾏｯｼｭ}「だが後戻りしても 帝国軍が待ち受けてるぜ… {ｶｲｴﾝ}「フム。 獣ケ原をぬけることができれば 東の海岸ぞいにモブリズという村が あるはずでござるが…
translation: South of here lieth the Beast Plain... a dangerous place with vicious beasts. {Mash}: But even if we turned back, the Imperial army would be waiting for us... {Cayenne}: Just so. There ought be a village called Mobliz on the eastern coast, should we be able to cross the Beast Plain...

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「俺の役目は終わった ようだな…
translation: It seems my duty is done...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「おまえには世話になったな。 またいっしょに冒険しようぜ。
translation: I owe you one. Let's have another adventure together.

source: 獣のようなかっこうをしているが、 そのひとみの奥には やさしいひかりをたたえた少年……
translation: His appearance is like a beast's, but the depths of the boy's eyes are filled with a kind light...

source: 『君は…？
translation: "Who are...?"

source: {ガウ} 「がうー！
translation: Gauu!

source: {ガウ} 「がうー！がうがう！！ おまえたち よそもの 出ていけ！ けものがはら でていけ！！
translation: Gauuu! Gau gau!! Yous outsiders. Get out! Get out Beast Plain!!

source: ディーンとカタリーナは１６さい。 恋おおき年ごろね。
translation: Dean and Catalina are 16. They're big on romance at that age.

source: 負傷兵「私はマランダの兵士です。 マランダが帝国に占りょうされ 帝国軍に入らざるをえなく なったのです。 ドマと戦うことがいやで、途中で脱そう したのですが… 追手の帝国兵に見つかり、傷をおって しまいました… 動くことすらできない… これでもう、二度とローラの顔も 見れないのか… つくえの上に手紙があるのです。 とっていただきませんか？
translation: I'm a Marandan soldier. Maranda was captured by the Empire, and we were forced to join the Imperial army. I didn't want to fight Doma, so I deserted along the way... But I was found and maimed by pursuing Imperial soldiers... I can't even move... Will this keep me from ever being able to see Lola's face again...? There's a letter on the desk. Could I trouble you to get it for me?

source: 帝国の兵隊達がマランダの町を歩き ものものしさが前にもましてますが それ以外は、いたって平和な毎日を すごしています。 そろそろ庭のお花がほころびはじめ 春が近いことを知らせています。 体のぐあいはどうですか？ 本当なら今すぐあなたのもとへ 飛んでいきたい…心配でたまりません。 とにかく体をなおすことだけを考えて。 無理は、けっしてしないでください。 あなたのことだけを毎日考えています。 はやく会いたい… ローラ
translation: The Imperial soldiers walking the town of Maranda are even more imposing than ever, but outside of that, we're living our days quite peacefully. It's about time for the flowers in the garden to start opening, telling me spring is near. How is your health doing? Honestly, I wish I could fly to your side right now... I'm so worried I can't stand it. In any case, think only of recovering. Please be sure not to strain yourself. I think only of you every day. I want to see you soon... - Lola

source: 返事を書きたいのですが、うでの傷が ひどくなってペンをにぎるころすら できません…
translation: I want to write a reply, but my arms are so badly wounded I can't even hold a pen...

source: ……あなたの好きなレコードが 見つかりません… あなたを、少しでもそばに感じられる と思ったのですが……
translation: ...your favorite record is nowhere to be found... I thought I could feel, just a little, like you were with me...

source: ローラの望みをかなえてやりたい… この体さえ動いたら…
translation: I want to grant Lola's wishes... If only my body would move...

source: ……最近母の具合がよくありません。 かといって、いまの私達には 薬を買うお金もありません。 ポーションがもう少しあれば……
translation: ...mother isn't feeling well lately. Regardless, we don't have the money now to buy medicine. If only we had a few more Potions...

source: ……なかなかお返事がこないので 心配です……
translation: ...I haven't gotten a reply from you lately, so I'm worried...

source: ……この前、手紙に書いてあった本。 いつか私にも読ませてね……
translation: ...you wrote about a book in your letter earlier. Let me read it, too, some time...

source: 聞きました… 私のかわりにローラにいろいろなものを 送ってくださったと。 本当にありがとうございます。 これは、お礼のしるしです。 受け取って下さい。 「タマのすず」を受け取った。
translation: I heard... Heard that you sent various things to Lola in my stead. I truly thank you. This is a token of my gratitude. Please accept it. Accepted Tama's Bell.

source: はやく傷をなおしてマランダに 帰りたい… ローラに会いたい…
translation: I want to recover and hurry back home to Maranda... I want to see Lola...

source: 「蛇の道」と呼ばれる、海の底を 走る海流をご存じかな？
translation: Do you know of the ocean current called the Serpent's Way that runs along the sea floor?

source: あれに乗れば、港町ニケアまで 行くことができるんだが… この村にあった、水中で息ができる ヘルメットが盗まれてしまったのだ。
translation: It would be possible to go all the way to the port town Nikaea if you rode it... But the helmet the village used to have that lets you breathe underwater was stolen.

source: はるか北の平野に家があったでしょ？ あそこの老人は少し気が変なの。 なんでも自分の子供を化け物と思って すててしまったとか…
translation: There's a house in the plains up north, right? The old man there's a bit funny in the head. Seems he thought his own child was a monster and threw the kid out...

source: 昨日、獣ケ原に狩りに出たとき モンスターの群れに子供がまじって いたような気がしたんだが… 気のせいかな…？
translation: I could have sworn there was a kid mixed in with a pack of monsters when I went out hunting on the Beast Plain yesterday... Was I just seeing things...?

source: このまえ「ほしにく」をモンスターの 群れにやったら、人間の子供がでて きて、それを持っていっちまったんだ
translation: When I gave some Jerky to a group of monsters the other day, a human kid came out and made off with it.

source: ウウウ…… はらへった……
translation: Oooo... Hungry...

source: {マッシュ} 「な なんだよ
translation: Wh-what's with you?

translation: I am {Cayenne}, and this be {Mash}.

translation: {Mash} and {Cayenne}, huh. Give more food.

translation: Ain't got any more.

translation: Then go find.

translation: *puff* *puff*! Hey, you're not half bad!

translation: Now, now, easy, easy. And in any case, who art thou?

translation: You mad?

translation: {Cayenne}! You get mad?

source: {ガウ} 「{カイエン}！ おこったのか？
translation: {Cayenne}! You get mad?

source: {ガウ} 「{カイエン}！ おこったのか？
translation: {Cayenne}! You get mad?

source: {マッシュ} 「じつは かくかく しかじか なんだ……
translation: Actually, (blah blah yadda yadda), you see...

translation: Me see. {Gau} sorry. Me sorry.

source: {カイエン} 「なに、いつまでもくよくよ してはいられぬ それに、{ガウ}、 おぬしとは、なにかうまがあい そうでござる！ いっしょに来るか？ {Cayenne}: Come now, no need to keep thyself so gloomy. And besides, {Gau}, 'twould seem we get on rather well with thee! Wouldst come with us? {CYAN}: Look! We can't have ye two prancing 'round all day! {GAU}, I think we're going to get on well together. Why don't you join us?
translation: Come now, no need to keep thyself so gloomy. And besides, {Gau}, 'twould seem we get on rather well with thee! Wouldst come with us?

source: {ガウ} 「あっ！！ プレゼントする！ {ガウ} {カイエン}と {マッシュ}にプレゼントする ほしにくの おれいする
translation: Aah!! Me give present! {Gau} give {Cayenne} and {Mash} present. Thank for Jerky.

source: {マッシュ} 「どうせ、くだらないもの なんじゃないのか……？
translation: Won't it just be junk anyway...?

source: {ガウ} 「{ガウ}の宝だ ピカピカ ピカピカ ピカピカの宝だ！
translation: {Gau}'s treasure. Glitter, glitter, treasure glitter!

translation: Who {Lock}? Bad guy? Try steal my treasure?

translation: {Lock}? He's...

translation: Listen when someone's talking!!!

translation: There's a strange old man in a shack down the Lethe River, right? I delivered that man's child thirteen years ago. But I wish I hadn't witnessed the birth. A dreadful delivery and the mother's death drove him out of his mind. He mistook the reddened baby for a monster and threw him out. I doubt the child's still alive.

I was artificially imbued with the power of magic when I was a child. {Tina}: Are you capable of love? {Celes}: ??? Are you mocking me?
