translation: The Empire has taken great damage from the Genjuu that flew from the Mystic Barricade. Their power is too immense... If we leave them be, they might even destroy the world...

source: 『たしかに、幻獣の力は強すぎる と思う… 『幻獣の力をこの世界に持ち込ん だのは、あなただ！
translation: "We have to agree that the Genjuu are too powerful..." "It was you who brought the power of the Genjuu into this world!"

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「封魔壁から出てきた幻獣の力に よって帝国が破壊された時にわしの 支配欲も消えた。今にして思えば なぜ、すべてが欲しくなったのか 自分でもわからないのだ… だからといって、自分のしてきたことを ちょう消しにしようとは思わないが… ところで… さっきの質問だが、いちばん最初に 聞かれたのはなんだったかな？
translation: When the Empire was destroyed by the power of the Genjuu from the Mystic Barricade, my lust for power vanished as well. Thinking about it now, I wonder why I wanted it all. I don't understand it myself... Even so, I don't expect to simply write off what I've been doing... By the way... those questions you asked me, which one did you ask first?

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「そうだった。 とにかく、わたしは和平を望んで いるのだ。それは真実だ。 わかってほしい…
translation: Ah, yes. In any case, I wish for peace. That is the truth. I want you to understand...

source: ｼﾄﾞ「少し、つかれましたな… 休けいにしてはどうですかな？
translation: That was a bit tiring... why don't we take a break?

source: 休けいする 話を続ける
translation: Take a break Keep talking

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「………
ｼﾄﾞ「和平が実現するといいのじゃが…
translation: I hope this peace works out...

source: 帝国兵「おまえたちの力を試したい。 ２分間だけ戦ってもらえないかな？
translation: We want to test your strength. Would you fight us for just two minutes?

source: 帝国兵「なるほど…
translation: I see...

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「わしに望む言葉があるかね？
translation: Are there any words you wish of me?

source: 『「平和を願う」と… 『「戦いの終わりをちかう」と… 『「すまなかった」と…
translation: "That you desire peace..." "That you vow the war is over..." "That you apologize..."

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「わかった。 戦いの終わりをちかおう。 そして、たのみがある…
translation: Very well. I vow that the war is over. Now, I have a request...

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「幻獣は帝国を攻撃したあと 北の方角、大三角島のほうへ 飛び去った。これをほうっておいては また、いつ暴れだすともかぎらない。 幻獣をさがしだし、和解をはかりたい のだが… 今まで帝国が幻獣にしてきたことを 考えれば、われわれだけが行っても 解決しないだろう… そこで… {ティナ}の力をかりたい。
translation: After the Genjuu attacked the Empire, they flew north toward Greater Triangle Island. If we just let them go, we can't be sure they won't start running wild again. I want to find the Genjuu and come to a resolution... But considering what the Empire has been doing to the Genjuu, I doubt we could settle anything on our own... And so... I want to borrow {Tina}'s help.

source: 『幻獣と人間の、はしわたしが できるとすれば… たしかに、{ティナ}しかいない…
translation: "If you need to mediate between Genjuu and humans... yes, {Tina}'s the only choice..."

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「すぐにでも、アルブルグから アーマー運搬船で大三角島に向か おうと思うのだが… 同行してくれるか？
translation: We intend to head for Greater Triangle Island by Armor transport from Alburg at once... Would you accompany us?

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「だが、幻獣をほうっておくわけ にはいかない。たのむ同行してくれ！
translation: But we cannot simply forget about the Genjuu. Please, accompany us!

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「帝国からも優秀な将軍と兵士を 同行させる。 レオ将軍！！
translation: I'll have a superior general and soldiers from the Empire travel with you as well. General Leo!!

source: ﾚｵ「将軍レオでございます。 よろしく。
translation: I am General Leo. Pleased to meet you.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「ドマでみかけた…？ そうか、あの時の… 敵ながらできたヤツ。 レオ将軍というのか……
translation: I saw him at Doma...? Right, he's that guy... an enemy, but decent. That's General Leo...

source: ﾚｵ「あなたは！？ ドマの戦士 {カイエン}どの。 ケフカが毒を使うのを止められな かったこと… ゆるしてほしい。 Leo: You!? Sir {Cayenne}, warrior of Doma. I hope you'll forgive me... I couldn't stop Cefca from using poison. LEO: You! You're {CYAN}, liege to the king of Doma! Please forgive me for not being there to stop Kefka...
translation: You!? Sir {Cayenne}, warrior of Doma. I hope you'll forgive me... I couldn't stop Cefca from using poison. LEO: You! You're {CYAN}, liege to the king of Doma! Please forgive me for not being there to stop Kefka...

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「……… おぬしのせいではござらんよ。
translation: ......... The fault is not thine.

source: ﾚｵ「それでは、アルブルグで 待っております。
translation: I'll be waiting in Alburg, then.

source: ｶﾞｽﾄﾗ「幻獣を見つけだし、彼らと 和解してくれ。 おまえたちだけが、たよりなのだ… たのむぞ。
translation: Find the Genjuu and make peace with them. I can rely only on you... Please take care of this.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{ティナ}が 行くのなら俺が行く。
translation: If {Tina}'s going, then I'm going.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「{ロック}… ありがとう。
translation: {Lock}... thank you.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「みんなは帝国に残ってくれ。 どうも、クサイにおいがする…
translation: The rest of you, stay in the Empire. I smell a rat...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「たしかに… 皇帝の言ったことをそのまま信用する のはむずかしいな…
translation: You have a point... It's difficult to trust what the emperor says just like that...

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「われらがここに残って帝国を 監視するでござる。
translation: We shall remain here and observe the Empire.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「そうしてくれ。 たのんだぜ！！
translation: Please do. I'm counting on you!!

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「ああ。 おまえも気をつけてな！
translation: Right. You be careful, too!

source: 皇帝からの伝言です… さっきの会食、およびあなたがたが 直接話した兵士の数によって、つぎの ことが決まりました。
translation: A message from the emperor... Based on the banquet earlier, as well as the number of soldiers you spoke with directly, the following has been decided.

source: サウスフィガロから帝国軍を てったいさせます。
translation: We are having the Imperial army withdraw from South Figaro.

source: また、ドマから帝国軍を、てったい させます。
translation: Additionally, we are having the Imperial army withdraw from Doma.

source: ここから東に行ったところにある 封魔壁の監視所の武器庫を 解放します。中の武器、防具は ご自由にお使いください。
translation: We will open the armory in the Mystic Barricade Lookout to the east. Please make free use of the weapons and armors inside.

source: そしてこれは、皇帝からの おくりものです… 「タマのすず」 を手に入れた
translation: And this is a gift from the emperor... Got a Tama's Bell.

source: あなたの会食での態度は完壁でした。 最後にひとつ、おくりものがあります 「たいまのうでわ」 を手に入れた
translation: Your manners at the banquet were flawless. We have one last gift for you. Got a Warding Bracelet.

source: ｹﾌｶ「けっ！どいつもこいつも なんで俺がこんなところに 入れられるんだ！！ カーッ！
translation: Keh! Screw everyone! How come I'm stuck in a place like this!? Kaaaah!

source: ｹﾌｶ「シンジラレナーイ！！！
translation: I can't BELIEVE it!!!

source: ｹﾌｶ「つまらん。
translation: How stupid.

source: ｺｳﾃｲ「アルブルグでレオ将軍が待って いる。共同で、大三角島に向かった 幻獣を探し出してくれ。 たのむぞ…
translation: General Leo is waiting in Alburg. Work together to search for the Genjuu that headed to Greater Triangle Island. I'm counting on you...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「アルブルグは帝国を出て南に 行ったところにある港町だ。 そこから魔導アーマーの運搬船で 大三角島へわたる計画だったな… 帝国の監視は俺たちでやる。 幻獣のほうはたのんだぞ。
translation: Alburg is a port city on the southern edge of the Empire. A Sorcerous Armor transport is scheduled to cross to Greater Triangle Island from there... We'll keep an eye on the Empire. You take care of the Genjuu.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「やはり、せっしゃ… ケフカだけは許せんでござる…
translation: I simply cannot... cannot forgive Cefca...

source: ナルシェのガード「われわれが 決起せずとも、帝国は自滅したわけだ
translation: So, the Empire brought itself to ruin without us even lifting a finger.

source: リターナー兵「戦争は… 終わったのですね……
translation: So... the war's over...

source: ｼﾞｭﾝ「……なるほど。 たしかに幻獣をほっておくわけには いかないな…
translation: ...I see. Certainly, we can't just ignore the Genjuu...

source: ﾊﾞﾅﾝ「ガストラがそんなことを言った のか…… 帝国と手を結んで幻獣をさがしに 行くというのか… フーム…
translation: Gastra said such a thing...? Joining hands with the Empire to go look for the Genjuu...? Hmmm...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「本当に帝国を信用して もだいじょうぶだろうか… 俺はなんだかいやな予感がする…
translation: Will we really be okay trusting the Empire...? I've got a bad feeling about this...

source: {ｶﾞｳ}「酒のにおい… おやじのにおい……？
translation: Smell like booze... smell like dad...?

source: {ﾓｸﾞ}「クポ！
translation: Kupo!

source: ｼﾄﾞ「立派な船じゃのう。 {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「不時着のショックで エンジンがやられちまった。 直すのに少し時間がかかるな…
translation: A fine ship. {Setzer}: The shock of the emergency landing did a number on the engine. It's gonna take a while to fix...

source: ｼﾄﾞ「わしが手伝おう。 メカの事ならくわしいぞ。
translation: I'll help. I know all about mechanics.

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「えんりょしとくよ。
translation: No thanks.

source: ｼﾄﾞ「ギャンブル場をつぶして 改造すれば、もっと速くなるぞ。
translation: You'd get more speed if you'd just scrap the casino and remodel a bit.

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「…… ろんがいだ！！ いいから出てってくれ！
translation: ...... Out of the question!! Just get out!

source: ｼﾄﾞ「本当に速くなるのにのー……
translation: But it really would go faster...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「本当に好きなのね。 この船が。 {Tina}: This ship... you must really like it. {TERRA}: You love this ship, more than anything, huh?
translation: This ship... you must really like it. {TERRA}: You love this ship, more than anything, huh?

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「きままなギャンブラー ぐらしをしてる俺にも、若いころは 必死で打ち込める事があった…
translation: I may be living the life of a selfish gambler, but in my youth I had something I was mad about...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「……え？
{ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「こいつを 世界一速い船にして大空をかける… そんな夢を追いかけていた。
translation: Making this the world's fastest ship and sailing the heavens... I chased after that dream.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「今は違うの？ {Tina}: But not anymore? {TERRA}: You mean......
translation: But not anymore? {TERRA}: You mean......

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「そのころは 俺を夢にかり立てるヤツがいた。 世界最速の船、ファルコン号を あやつる飛空艇乗りだ。 俺とヤツは… 時にはよきライバル、 時には夢を語り合う親友だった。 どちらが先に空を突き破り、満天の 星空の中を航海できるかと…… だがヤツがファルコンと共に 姿を消した時、俺の青春も終わった。
translation: There was someone who spurred on my dream back then. Ran the world's fastest ship, the airship Falcon. The two of us... we were great rivals at times, great friends talking about our dreams at others. About which of us could first break through the sky and voyage into the starry heavens... But when my friend and the Falcon went missing together, my youth ended, too.

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「…… ダリル………
{ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「飛空艇の修理はまだだ。 とりあえずアルブルグから船で すすんでくれ。
translation: The airship's still not repaired. Go ahead on the ship from Alburg for now.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「{ガウ}が… {ﾛｯｸ}「船が苦手なんだろ。 しかたない、２人で行こう。
translation: {Gau}... {Lock}: Must not be good with boats. Oh well, let's go with just us two.

source: ﾚｵ「待っていたぞ。 私と同行するのは帝国の将軍一人と 街でやとった男一人だ。
translation: I've been waiting. Traveling with me are another Imperial general and a man we hired in town.

source: 俺は名をすてた男… 人は俺を………
translation: I'm a man who abandoned his name... People call me...

source: ﾚｵ「しょうかいしよう。 {セリス}将軍と{シャドウ}だ。
translation: Let me introduce you. General {Celes} and {Shadow}.

source: ﾚｵ「どうかしたのか？ {ﾛｯｸ}「いえ……
translation: Is something wrong? {Lock}: No...

source: ﾚｵ「さて、出港は明日だ。 君達のために宿をとっておいた。
translation: So, we're departing tomorrow. I've arranged lodging for you all.

source: ﾚｵ「今日はゆっくり休んでくれ。
translation: Take your time and rest today.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「{セリス}…… {ｾﾘｽ}「……
translation: {Celes}... {Celes}: ......

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{セリス}……
translation: {Celes}...

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「今は帝国にやとわれた身だ。 …と言っても心配はするな。 お前らを殺るためにやとわれたわけ では無いからな。
translation: I'm in the employ of the Empire now. ...but even so, don't worry. I wasn't hired to kill you.

source: レオ将軍からうけたまわって おります。 どうぞ…
translation: We have received word from General Leo. Go right ahead...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{セリス}…
translation: {Celes}...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「どうして… どうして何も話してくれない？
translation: Why... why won't you say anything to me?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「少しでも… うたがってしまって… だが、まだ仲間として…
translation: Just a little... I did doubt you... but we're still on the same side...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{セリス}！
translation: {Celes}!

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「船に乗る前に、 こいつには羽をのばさせてやらないと
translation: I've got to let him stretch his wings before we get on the ship.

source: ﾚｵ「さあ、行くぞ。
translation: Now, let's go.

source: 兵士「機関、動力とも異常ありません。
translation: No engine or motive problems.

source: ﾚｵ「明日の朝には着くだろう。 それまで休んでいるといい。
translation: I expect to arrive tomorrow morning. You can rest until then.

source: ﾚｵ「ねつけないのか？
translation: Can't fall asleep?

source: ﾚｵ「感情がもどったそうだな…
translation: I hear your emotions have returned...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「……不思議なものね。 帝国に利用され、思考までをも コントロールされていた私が、 こうしてまた帝国の人間と ともに行動しているなんて。
translation: ...it's funny. I was used by the Empire, and even my thoughts were controlled, but now here I am, working together with people from the Empire again.

source: ﾚｵ「帝国の人間とて、同じ人間。 全てがケフカのようなヤツばかり ではない。
translation: In the Empire or not, we're still human. We aren't all like Cefca.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「あなたは………どうなの？
translation: What about... you?

source: ﾚｵ「お前が幻獣とのハーフであり 魔導の実験台として苦しめられている のを知りながら… それを止められなかった俺も、 ケフカと同罪さ…
translation: I knew that you were a Genjuu hybrid who was being abused as a sorcery guinea pig... I'm just as guilty as Cefca for not being able to stop it...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「幻獣と人間が 愛し合えるのなら… その子である私と人間とは… 愛し合えるのかしら？
translation: If it's possible for a Genjuu and a human to love each other... as their child, can I and a human... love each other?

source: ﾚｵ「もちろんだとも。
translation: But of course.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「でも… 私はまだ愛という感情を知らない。
translation: But... I don't know what love is yet.

source: ﾚｵ「お前はまだ若い。 ……いずれわかるようになる。 きっと……
translation: You're still young. ...you'll understand eventually. I'm sure of it...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「でも…… 私は、今知りたい……
translation: But... I want to know now...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「誰……？
translation: Who's there...?

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「星を見ながら ねようと思ってな。
translation: Thought I'd go to sleep watching the stars.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「今の話…… 聞いていたの？
translation: Did you... hear what we were talking about?

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「聞くつもりはなかった。
translation: I didn't mean to listen in.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「あの……
translation: Um...

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「俺は、何も教えてやれん。 答は自分で見つけるものだ。
translation: I can't teach you anything. You need to find your own answers.

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「{ティナ}。
translation: {Tina}.

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「世の中には、 自ら感情をすてて生きようとする 人間もいるのだ。 それを、忘れるな。
translation: Some in this world try to throw away their own emotions and live life that way. Don't forget that.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「う う う……
translation: Uuuuurk...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ぐ ぐるぢひ～
translation: F-feeling lousy...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「げろげろ～
translation: *puke*

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「なんてこったい… 世界一のトレジャーハンターとも あろうものが…
translation: What a joke... Some world's greatest treasure hunter I am...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「げろげろ～
translation: *puke*

source: 大三角島には、失われた魔法の力が いまだ、わずかながら残っていると うわさされています。
translation: It's rumored that on Greater Triangle Island the lost power of magic remains even now, though only faintly.

source: ﾚｵ「もうすぐ大三角島だ。 上陸したら二手に別れよう。 私と{セリス}が組むから、 君は{ロック}と {シャドウ}と組んでくれ。 幻獣の手がかりを見つける事が できたなら、すぐ報告をするように。
translation: We're nearly to Greater Triangle Island. We'll split into two groups upon making land. {Celes} and I are teaming up, so you go with {Lock} and {Shadow}. Report at once if you're able to find any signs of the Genjuu.

source: ﾚｵ「{ティナ}、 昨日の話のつづきはまた再会の時に…
translation: {Tina}, we can continue yesterday's conversation when we meet again...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「俺達もいくか。
translation: Guess we'd better head out too.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{シャドウ}！
translation: {Shadow}!

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「あ、{ロック}…
translation: Ah, {Lock}...

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「あの、わたし……
translation: Um, I...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「いくぞ。
translation: Let's go.

source: 村長「ゆっくりしていきなされ。 魔法…？ なんですかなそれは？
translation: Make yourselves at home. Magic...? And what would that be?

source: 幻獣？ 何だ、それは？ 獣の事なら、村はずれの家にすむ じいさんに聞いてみな。
translation: Genjuu? What's that? If it's a creature, try asking the old man who lives in the house on the edge of the village.

source: 村はずれの{ストラゴス}じいさんは、 ああ見えても、昔はすごいりょうし だったんだ。
translation: Old man {Stragus}, on the edge of the village, may not look like much, but he used to be an amazing hunter.

source: わしになんの用ゾイ？
translation: What did you want of me?

source: しょうがいをかけて モンスターの謎を追いつづける じゅんすいな夢を持った老人……
translation: He has spent a lifetime pursuing the mysteries of monsters. An old man with pure dreams...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「幻獣？ 幻獣… んー 久しく聞かなかった言葉じゃゾイ。 {ﾛｯｸ}「知っているんですか？
translation: Genjuu? Genjuu... hmm... I've not heard that word in a long time. {Lock}: You know about them?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「いや、知らぬ。 知らん 知らん… わしゃ な～んも 知らんゾイ。
translation: No, I don't. Don't know, don't know... Really. Don't know. A thing.

source: 『あやしい……
translation: "Suspicious..."

source: おじーちゃーん！！
translation: Graaaampaaaa!!

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「あた、あた、あた
translation: Hey, hey, hey!

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「まったく… なにをするんじゃ。
translation: Good grief... what are you up to?

source: その絵ふでは、すべてのものを キャンバスにえがきだす… 森、水、光 そして、人の心までも
translation: Her paintbrush expresses all things on canvas... woods, water, light, and even human hearts.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「おじいちゃん。 誰、そこの人？ 新しいお客さん？ この人も魔法をつかう人なの？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「あわわっ こら！
translation: Grampa. Who're these people? New guests? Are they magic users too? {Stragus}: Ack, cut it out!

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「まあ かわいい犬。 {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「よせ。 かみつかれるぞ。
translation: Ooh, what a cute dog. {Shadow}: Don't. You'll get bitten.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「奥に入ってなさい。 {ﾘﾙﾑ}「なんでなのよ～！ この、がんこジジイ！！
translation: Go back upstairs. {Relm}: How come!? You stubborn old geezer!!

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「いいから行くのじゃ！ {ﾘﾙﾑ}「はーい。
translation: Just go, already! {Relm}: Fiiiine.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「これこれ よそさまの犬を…
translation: Oh, dear me, your dog...

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「イ～ッだ！！
translation: Nyaaaah!!

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「まったく、もう…
translation: Oh, dear me...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「すまんゾイ。 {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「かまわん。 人にはなつかない犬なのに…
translation: Sorry about that. {Shadow}: I don't mind. My dog just never likes anyone...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「すまんが きっと力にはなれんぞ。 {ﾛｯｸ}「そ、そうですか… {Stragus}: Terribly sorry, but I'm sure I can't help you. {Lock}: R-really... {STRAGO}: Please excuse her. She's just young. {LOCKE}: Hmmm...
translation: Terribly sorry, but I'm sure I can't help you. {Lock}: R-really... {STRAGO}: Please excuse her. She's just young. {LOCKE}: Hmmm...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「ここは、どこにでもある いなかの村に過ぎぬ。 幻獣などといった話とは、 ま～ったく関係ないのじゃ。
translation: This is nothing more than a run-of-the-mill country village. We have aaaabsolutely nothing to do with such things as Genjuu.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「う～む。 この村には、なにかあるな… {ﾃｨﾅ}「しばらく様子を見ましょう。
translation: Hmm. Something's up with this village... {Tina}: Let's look around a bit.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「では、私たちはこれで… {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「なんの役にもたてんで、 すまんかったの。
translation: We'll be off, then... {Stragus}: Sorry I couldn't be of any help.

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「インターセプター！ 行くぞ！
translation: Interceptor! We're leaving!

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「バイバイ
translation: Bye-bye.

source: 『ん？ 何の声だ？
translation: "Hm? Do I hear someone?"

source: ファイア！！
translation: Fire!!

source: ファイア！！
translation: Fire!!

source: んが！？ やべえ！
translation: Ngah!? Oh, crap!

source: 『ん？ 何の声だ？
translation: "Hm? Do I hear someone?"

source: ママー、いたいよー
translation: Mommy, it hurts!

source: はいはい。ケア…
translation: Fine, fine. Cur...

source: 薬はどこかしら…
translation: Now where was my medicine...?

source: ママー ケアルしてよー！
translation: Mommy... do Cure!

source: {ストラゴス}じいさんに あったのかい？ じゃあ、宿屋の親父もむちゃな 値段はいわないだろうね。
translation: You've met old man {Stragus}? The old man at the inn probably won't charge you ridiculous prices, then.

source: １ぱく１ギルになります。 おやすみになられますか？
translation: One night's one gil. Care to rest?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「大変じゃ！ {リルム}が！
translation: It's terrible! {Relm}!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「{リルム}ちゃんが！？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「そうなんじゃ！ {リルム}が火事になって、 近所の家がまきこまれて… あややや……、何が何だか わからなくなってきたゾイ！
translation: {Relm}-chan!? {Stragus}: Yes! {Relm} is stuck in a neighbor's house that caught on fire... Ayayaya... I just don't know what's what anymore!

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「とにかく！ 手をかしてくれんか！
translation: Anyhow! Would you help me!?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{シャドウ}！
translation: {Shadow}!

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「インターセプター… どこだ！？
translation: Interceptor... where are you!?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「{リルム}が！ あの家の中にいるんじゃ！
translation: {Relm}! She's inside that house!

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「{リルム}ー！！
translation: {Relm}!!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「それは！？
translation: Hey!?

source: でやっ！
translation: Take that!

source: 村長「魔法は禁じたはずじゃ！ {ﾃｨﾅ}「魔法！？
translation: Magic is supposed to be prohibited! {Tina}: Magic!?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「そんな事……！！ {リルム}が中にいるのじゃゾイ！
translation: Forget about that...!! {Relm}'s inside!

source: 「村長！
translation: : Chief!

source: 村長「うむむ… いたしかたあるまい。
translation: Yes, yes... We have little choice.

source: 村長「はなれていなされ。
translation: Stand aside.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「だめじゃ 火の勢いが強すぎるゾイ！ 村長「この家には、ほのおのロッドが つんであったから…
translation: It's no use. The fire is too intense! Village Chief: They had Fire Rods stockpiled in this house...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「わしが行くゾイ！
translation: I'm going in!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「待って、私も行くわ。 {ﾛｯｸ}「そうだぜ、じいさん。 みずくさいじゃないか。 {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「何をいう！ わしはじいさんと呼ばれるほど 老いぼれてはおらんゾイ！
translation: Wait, I'll go too. {Lock}: That's right, gramps. Don't be a stranger. {Stragus}: What was that!? I'm not decrepit enough to be called gramps!

source: 『急ごう！
translation: "Let's hurry!"

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「火のまわりが早いな。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「今にもくずれてきそう… {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「はやく{リルム}を 見つけないと！
translation: The fire's spreading fast. {Tina}: It could collapse any minute now... {Stragus}: We've got to hurry up and find {Relm}!

source: 『火を放ったのはこいつか！？
translation: "Is this what started the fire!?"

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「{リルム}は！ {リルム}はどこじゃ～っ！！
translation: {Relm}! Where's {Relm}!?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「{リルム}ー！！
translation: {Relm}!!

source: 『うわあ！ 『間にあわなかった！！
translation: "Waah!" "We didn't make it in time!!"

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「脱出するぞ。 けむりだま！
translation: We're getting out of here. Smoke Ball!

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「よくなったかの？ {ﾘﾙﾑ}「うん。おじいちゃん。
translation: Are you better? {Relm}: Sure am, grampa.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「この人達のおかげじゃ。 {ﾘﾙﾑ}「ありがとう。
translation: We owe it to these people. {Relm}: Thanks.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「しかし… 恥ずかしい所を見せてしまった ようじゃな。
translation: However... I would seem to have shown you something awkward.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ここの人は、皆 魔法を使えるようだが、 いったいこの村は…？
translation: It looks as though all the people here can use magic. What's with this village...?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「ここは…… 魔導士達の村。
translation: This is... the village of the sorcerers.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「昔、人間は魔石から 魔導の力をとりだした。 そして魔法を使えるようになった 人間が魔導士とよばれる人。
translation: Long ago, humans extracted the power of sorcery from magicite. Those humans who became able to use magic were then called sorcerers.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「魔導士はもうこの世に いないと思っていました。
translation: I thought there weren't any sorcerers left in the world.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「魔大戦の後、 幻獣達は封魔壁の向こうに結界をはり そこにかくれ住んだ。 自分達の魔導の力を利用される事を 恐れたのじゃ。 そして、残ったのは人間だけ。 普通の人間達が最も恐れたのが 魔導士達の力。皆、魔大戦の悲惨さが 身にしみておるからの。
translation: After the Great Magic War, the Genjuu set up a separate world beyond the Mystic Barricade and lived there in hiding. They feared that their powers of sorcery would be abused. Only we humans remained here then. What ordinary humans most feared was the power of the sorcerers. The misery of the Great Magic War had left a powerful impression.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「そこで行われたのが 魔導士狩り。 不当な裁判により魔導士達は次々と 殺されていったのじゃ。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「魔法を使えること以外 何も変わらない人間なのに……
translation: And so, what was done was the hunting of sorcerers. Sorcerers were killed one after another in unjust trials. {Tina}: Even though they were human, no different except for using magic...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「その時に逃げ出し この土地にかくれ住んだ魔導士達が われわれの先祖じゃ。 血がうすまり、魔導の力はだいぶ おとろえたが、 なんらかの形でまだ残っておる。
translation: Those sorcerers who fled then to live in hiding in these lands were our ancestors. Their blood has thinned, and our sorcerous powers have largely faded, but they still remain in some form.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「もし、よければ… 私達に協力してくれませんか？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「幻獣がどうのと 言っておったな。
translation: If you wouldn't mind... would you work with us? {Stragus}: You were saying something about the Genjuu.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「{リルム}の命を すくってくれた恩を返さなくては。 その幻獣さがし、わしも手伝うゾイ。
translation: I do have to repay the favor for saving {Relm}'s life. I'll help with your Genjuu search.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「{リルム}も！ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「だめじゃ。
translation: Me too! {Stragus}: No.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「{リルム}つまんない……
translation: How boring...

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「しかし、どうすれば？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「む～～ この島に幻獣が逃げ込んだのなら、 村の西にある山かもしれんゾイ。
translation: But what should we do? {Stragus}: Hmm... If the Genjuu fled to this island, they may be in the mountains west of the village.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「山？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「強い魔力をおびた山ゾイ。 伝説では、幻獣の聖地と言われとる。
translation: In the mountains? {Stragus}: Mountains tinged with strong magical power. Legends call them a Genjuu holy land.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「暴走した幻獣達は、 その魔力に引きよせられた…？
translation: Were the Genjuu drawn by that magical power when they were out of control...?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「行ってみよう。
translation: Let's try going.

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「カン違いするな。 こいつのためだ。
translation: Don't misunderstand. I did it for this guy.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「出ていくのか？ {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「俺は、俺のやり方で 幻獣をさがす。
translation: You're leaving? {Shadow}: I'll search for Genjuu my way.

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「インターセプター！ 行くぞ！
translation: Interceptor! We're leaving!

source: {ストラゴス}じいさんの技は青魔法。 見たモンスターの攻撃をおぼえるんだ。 でも、ねてたり、こんらんしていたら おぼえないよ。
translation: Old man {Stragus}'s skill is Blue Magic. He memorizes monster attacks he's seen. But he can't memorize them if he's, say, asleep or confused.

source: 実は、{リルム}ちゃんは、 {ストラゴス}の本当のマゴでは ないんじゃ。 なんでも、友人の子供らしいんじゃ。 うわさじゃがの。
translation: Actually, {Relm}-chan isn't {Stragus}'s real grandchild. I hear she's his friend's child. It's just a rumor, though.

source: 村長「われわれが魔法を使えることは 誰にも話さないで下さい。
translation: Please tell no one that we are able to use magic.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「こ、これは…… 三闘神の像！？ {ﾃｨﾅ}「三闘神？
translation: Th-these are... statues of the Three Warring Gods!? {Tina}: Three Warring Gods?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「石像の表面に細かい 文字がほられているな。
translation: There's writing finely carved into the surfaces of the statues.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「で、じいさん、 三闘神っていうのは、何のことだい？
translation: So, old man, what are these Three Warring Gods?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「三闘神とは、はるか昔 この世界に魔法という力を生み出した 伝説の神のことじゃ。 {ﾛｯｸ}「魔法の神様、ということか？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「そう言ってもよいゾイ。
translation: The Three Warring Gods are the legendary gods who long ago gave birth to the power of magic in this world. {Lock}: So, the gods of magic, then? {Stragus}: That's a fair way to put it.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「すごい魔力を感じるわ。 {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「三闘神は魔法の神。 ということは、幻獣の作り主とも 言えるわけじゃ。 幻獣達は、三闘神の像を作って 聖地にまつったという伝説がある。 きっと、ここがその場所なのじゃ。
translation: I sense incredible magical power. {Stragus}: The Three Warring Gods are the gods of magic, which is also to say that they are the creators of the Genjuu. There are legends that the Genjuu made statues of the Three Warring Gods and enshrined them in a holy land. This is surely that place.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「きっと幻獣達は この像の魔力に引きよせられて この島にたどりついたのね。
translation: The Genjuu must have been drawn to this island by the magical power of these statues.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「ところで、じいさん その三闘神とやらは、幻獣を生んだ後 どうなったんだい？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「戦いにつかれた三闘神は おのれの体を石化させて 永遠の眠りについたという。 その場所が、封魔壁の奥であると 伝説は伝えとる。
translation: By the way, old man. What became of those Three Warring Gods after they gave birth to the Genjuu? {Stragus}: Weary of battle, the Three Warring Gods turned their own bodies to stone and entered an eternal slumber. Their location is told in legend to be beyond the Mystic Barricade.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「封魔壁が幻獣界との接点で あるのも、三闘神の魔力によるもの なのかしら？
translation: Could it be the magical power of the Three Warring Gods that makes the Mystic Barricade the only point of contact with the Genjuu World?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「な～るほどね。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「幻獣達が像の魔力に 引きよせられたのなら、あの奥に…？
translation: Makes sense. {Tina}: If the Genjuu were drawn by the magical power of the statues, then they're in there...?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「行ってみよう。
translation: Let's try going.

source: 魔導の始まり…… 天からおりたてし３人の神 互いを恐れて戦いを始めん 戦いにまき込まれしものは 幻獣へとその姿を変え 神のしもべとなりて永き時を戦う
translation: The dawn of sorcery... Three gods who descended from the heavens began a war in fear of each other. Those caught in the fighting transformed into Genjuu and became minions to the gods, who battled at great length.

source: 争いを呼ぶ、おのれの強大な力の おろかさに気づきし神は 互いの力を中和させることにより 自らを封印せん そして最後の力で幻獣に心を与え 自らを石に変化せしむ 神が幻獣に残した最後の言葉 「われらを永久に封印せよ」
translation: "Seal us away for all eternity."

source: 永き眠りについた神をあがめ その力が再び用いられぬことを願いて この像を作らん かつて神が天よりおりたてし 地にまつりて、後世への警告となす
translation: We build these statues in reverence of the gods in their eternal slumber, and with the hope that their power will never be used again. We enshrine these here on earth as an admonition to future generations of the gods that once descended from the heavens.

source: ｵﾙﾄﾛｽ「へへへ、このキンピカの像は おれ様のものだ～。 これでジークフリードの兄貴に 顔向けできるよ～ん。
translation: Heh heh heh, these glittering gold statues are all mine! Now I'll be worthy of showing my face to Siegfried!

source: ｵﾙﾄﾛｽ「お～、ひかってる ひかってる。すん ばらしい～。
translation: Ohhh, they're glowing, glowing. So wooonderful!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「てめえ、オルトロス！ 二度ならず三度までも！ ｵﾙﾄﾛｽ「これがホントの 三度目の正直 だよ～ん。
translation: Dammit, Orthros! Three times? Wasn't twice enough!? Orthros: Oh, but this is all about "third time's a charm"!

source: また出ちゃった しつこい？ だって、タコだもん。
translation: I'm back again. Stubborn? Well, I am an octopus after all.

source: オルトロスの体質が変化した！ ３属性の攻撃に注意！！
translation: Orthros's nature changed! Beware of prime trait attacks!!

source: いま、むかつくタコ野郎と 思わなかった？ ごめんね ごめんね
translation: You didn't just think I'm a damn annoying octopus, did you? Sorry, sorry.

source: {リルム} 「おじいちゃん！ 来ちゃった……！
translation: Gramps! I'm here...!

source: {ストラゴス} 「{リルム}！ 家にいろと言ったじゃろ！
translation: {Relm}! Didn't I tell you to stay home!?

source: {リルム} 「お絵かきなら、なんでもこいの {リルム}様、初登場！
translation: Anything goes for an artist. The great {Relm} makes her debut!

source: 「ねえねえ、あんただあれ？
translation: Hey, hey, who're you?

source: オルトロス 「だあれとは、失礼な！ このオルトロス様に向かって！！
translation: Who am I? How rude to say such a thing to the great Orthros!!

source: {ロック} 「{リルム}様に、オルトロス様 なんだか、わけが分からなくなって きたなあ……？
translation: The great {Relm} and the great Orthros. Is it just me, or are things making less and less sense...?

source: {リルム} 「ねえねえ、オルちゃん、 似顔絵かいてあげようか？
translation: Hey, hey, Or-chan, want me to draw your portrait?

source: オルトロス 「オ、オルちゃん！、失礼な！ このオルトロス様に向かって！！ 似顔絵なんぞ、いらんわい！
translation: O-Or-chan! How rude to say such a thing to the great Orthros!! I don't need no stinking portrait!

source: {リルム} 「えーん、えーん あげないんだもん…… かいてあげないんだもん
translation: Fiiiine, fiiiine, I won't do it... I'm not gonna draw you.

source: {リルム} 「いいんだもん…… {リルム}ここから…… 飛びおりてやるんだもん
translation: No biggie... I'm just gonna... jump off over here.

source: {ティナ} 「だめよ！！ そんなことしちゃだめ！！！
translation: No!! You can't do that!!!

source: 「ひそひそ……
translation: (whispering)...

source: {ティナ} 「どーすんの？、こんな小さい 子、いじめちゃって！ 何かあったら許さないわよ！！
translation: What do you think you're doing? Picking on such a small child! I'm blaming you if anything happens!!

source: オルトロス 「そ、そんなあ…… じゃあ、どーすりゃいいのよ？
translation: Th-that's not... Then what am I supposed to do?

source: {ロック} 「かいてもらえよ かっこよく、かいてもらえるかも しれないぜ
translation: Have her draw you. Maybe you even could get her to make you look good.

source: {ロック} 「この、この、にくいねえ
translation: You, you hateful little...

source: オルトロス 「………… ………… ………… ………… ………… ………… ………… ………… オルちゃん 似顔絵 かいてもらっちゃうもんねー！
{リルム} 「えへへ わたしの得意技にまかせていてよ！
translation: *giggle* Just leave it to my super skills!

source: {ストラゴス} 「とにかく、こっちへ！
translation: Anyhow, get over here!

source: そんな…それじゃまるで…… まるっきり タコじゃん！
translation: Nuh-uh... it's just like... just like I'm a total octopus!

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「ね？ 見てくれた？ {リルム}も立派に戦えるよ。 ジジイよりは役立つんじゃない？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「ジ、ジジイ！？
translation: Well? Did you see that? I can fight just fine, too. Aren't I more useful than the old geezer? {Stragus}: O-old geezer!?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「つれてっても いいんじゃない？
translation: Would it hurt to take her along?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「わかったわかった。 しょうがないやつじゃ。 {ﾘﾙﾑ}「やったー！
translation: Fine, fine. I don't have much choice. {Relm}: Oh, yeah!

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「これが……幻獣……！？
translation: This is... a Genjuu...!?

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「なんじゃ、こいつら！
translation: What's the matter with them!?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「幻獣がこんなに…… {ﾛｯｸ}「じいさん、{リルム}を つれて逃げるんだ。
translation: So many Genjuu... {Lock}: Old man, take {Relm} and run.

source: ﾕﾗ「待て！
translation: Wait!

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「なに？ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「{ティナ}に…… 強い魔力を感じる。 いや……魔導の力と言うべきか……
translation: What? {Stragus}: I sense strong magical power... in {Tina}. Or... should I say sorcerous power...?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「また、あの時のように 暴走するのか？
translation: Is she going to go out of control again, like before?

source: ﾕﾗ「君は…ちょっと違う…… われわれと同じチカラを感じる。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「ええ。
translation: You're... a bit different... I sense a power like ours. {Tina}: Yes.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「お前達は幻獣界の 若者なんじゃな？ ﾕﾗ「幻獣界には、こちらの世界に 来てはならぬと言う おきてがあります。 でも魔石化された仲間を助けるために 若者達が扉の前に集結したのです。 その時に{ティナ}の姿が…
translation: So you're the youngsters from the Genjuu World? Yura: The Genjuu World has a law that forbids us from coming to this world. But we young ones assembled by the gate to rescue our kindred who were turned to magicite. And just then, {Tina}...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「私も感じました。 あなた達の想いが扉の中から。 ﾕﾗ「{ティナ}が扉を開けてくれた 事で外に出ることができました。 しかしこちらの世界に出たとたんに 自分の力をコントロールできなくなって しまったのです。
translation: I sensed you, too. Your feelings, from inside the gate. Yura: We were able to get out when {Tina} opened the gate for us. No sooner had we entered this world, though, but we lost control of our own powers.

source: ﾕﾗ「そのために、一つの都市を メチャメチャに破壊してしまい、 罪の無い人達まで…
translation: Because of that, we destroyed a city, reducing it to a shambles, and even innocent people...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「私と同じだわ… 突然手に入れた力をコントロール できなくて…
translation: Just like me... I couldn't control the power I suddenly gained...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「おそらく幻獣はあちらの 世界では力がある程度おさえられる 傾向があるのじゃろう。 それが突然開放されたために…
translation: Most likely, the other world has properties such that Genjuu power is suppressed to a certain degree. Because it was suddenly unleashed...

source: ﾕﾗ「幻獣によっては精神に失調を きたし人に危害を加える者も… 本当にもうしわけない。
translation: Some among us lost mental stability and even caused harm to people... this was truly inexcusable.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「帝国も幻獣達との 和解を望んでいる。 どうだ？ 俺達と来ては。 ﾕﾗ「……われわれをゆるして くれるのか？
translation: The Empire hopes to come to a settlement with the Genjuu, as well. How about it? Come with us. Yura: ...they would forgive us?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「サマサの村へ行って レオ将軍達と合流しよう。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「そうね。
translation: Let's head for the village of Thamasa and meet up with General Leo and the others. {Tina}: Right.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「レオ将軍。 ﾚｵ「おお、{ロック}か。 幻獣達に会えたようだな。 手間をかけた。
translation: General Leo. Leo: Ah, {Lock}. It seems you were able to meet with the Genjuu. I appreciate your efforts.

source: ﾚｵ「私は、帝国の将軍、レオ。 あなたの名前をうかがいたい。 ﾕﾗ「私は、ユラ。
translation: I am Leo, an Imperial general. I would ask your name. Yura: I am Yura.

source: ﾕﾗ「われわれはあなた方に とんでもない事をしてしまった。 許してくれなどと言えた立場では 無いかもしれないが……
translation: We have done horrific things to you all. Perhaps we are in no position to request that you forgive us, but...

source: ﾚｵ「わかっている。 おかした過ちを責める気はない。 逆にあなた方を戦争のための力として しか考えていなかった自分をはじる。 魔大戦の過ちを再び引きおこそうと していた自分達を…… ﾕﾗ「そう言ってくれるとありがたい。
translation: We understand. We have no interest in condemning you for mistakes made. On the contrary, we are ashamed for thinking of you as no more than a power for war. For nearly repeating the mistakes of the Great Magic War all over again... Yura: We are grateful for your words.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「これで俺達の役目も終わる。 本当の平和が訪れるかもしれないな。 {ｾﾘｽ}「もどりましょう、ベクタへ。
translation: And now our duty is done. Maybe true peace will come. {Celes}: Let's go back to Vector.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「{セリス}……
translation: {Celes}...

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「なにも言わないで。
translation: Don't say a thing.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「おあついね… {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「若さ、じゃのお。
translation: Hubba hubba... {Stragus}: Ah, such is youth.

source: ｹﾌｶ「ひょっ ひょっ ひょっ ぼくちんの魔導アーマー隊の力を 見せてやるぞ！
translation: Hyo, hyo, hyo! I'll show you the power of my little old Sorcerous Armor squad!

source: ﾚｵ「ケフカ！ 何をする！ ｹﾌｶ「ヒヒヒ…皇帝の命令です。 幻獣達を魔石化して持ってこいとね。 見よ！幻獣を魔石化させる秘技を！！
translation: Cefca! What are you doing!? Cefca: Hee, hee, hee... emperor's orders: Bring back the Genjuu as magicite. Behold! A secret technique to magicitize them!!

source: ｹﾌｶ「つまらん！！
translation: How stupid!!

source: ｹﾌｶ「おもしろくないから こんな村なんて焼きはらっちゃいな！
translation: This village is no fun, so burn it all to ashes!

source: ﾚｵ「ケフカ！ やめるんだ！
translation: Cefca! Stop it!

source: ｹﾌｶ「うるさい！
translation: Shut up!

source: ｱｰﾏｰ兵「レオ将軍、おかくご！
translation: General Leo, prepare yourself!

source: ﾚｵ「ダメだ！ いったん引こう。
translation: No good! Let's pull back for now.

source: ﾚｵ「ケフカ！ おまえのおこない もう許すわけにはいかぬ！
translation: Cefca! I cannot overlook your actions any longer!

source: ケフカ 「さすがは、レオ…… 私をこのような目にあわすとは……
translation: That's Leo for you... putting me through all this...

source: レオ 「どこだ…… ケフカ…… 姿を見せろ！！
translation: Cefca... where are you...? Show yourself!!

source: ケフカ 「ガストラ皇帝…… おいでください…… ムニャ ムニャ
translation: Emperor Gastra... Come here, please... mumble mumble

source: ガストラ皇帝 「レオよ……
translation: Leo...

source: レオ 「皇帝！
translation: Emperor!

source: ガストラ皇帝 「レオ。おまえまでだまして すまなかった。 これも、魔石を手に入れるた め。わしの真意、わかってく れるであろうな
translation: Leo. I apologize for having deceived even you. This, too, was to obtain magicite. You do understand my motives, don't you?

source: レオ 「皇帝。が、しかし……
translation: Emperor. B-but...

source: ガストラ皇帝 「言うな、レオ。お前の気持ち 解からぬでもない
translation: Don't say it, Leo. It is not as though I do not understand your feelings.

source: ケフカ 「ヒッヒッヒッ 皇帝のおっしゃる通り！ 今は、魔石を集めるのが先決な のだよ
translation: Hee, hee, hee, just like the emperor says! Our top priority now is collecting magicite.

source: レオ 「皇帝、では、私はいったい……
translation: Then, Emperor, what have I...?

source: ガストラ皇帝 「レオ、お前には、少し休んで いてもらおう。 それも、ずーっと長ーくだ！ ヒッヒッヒッ
translation: Leo, I would have you take some time off. A veeery loooong time! Hee, hee, hee!

source: ケフカ 「お前が倒した私…… それは私の幻影なのだよ！ そして、意気地なしのガス トラ皇帝も、もちろん、幻影！ それくらいの違いがわからな いヤツが将軍だなんて、それも いつも、いつも……
translation: The me you beat... that was an illusion of me! And that spineless Emperor Gastra was illusion too, of course! How can you be a general if you can't even tell the difference? And you're always, always...

source: 「いつもいつも、いいこぶりや がって！
translation: Always, always, acting like such a fucking goody two-shoes!

source: レオ 「ケ、ケフカ…… お前というやつは……
translation: C-Cefca... you little piece of...

source: ケフカ 「ヒッヒッヒ… 皇帝には、レオは本心で裏切っ たと、報告しておくよ！
translation: Hee, hee, hee... I'll report to the emperor that Leo betrayed him at heart!

source: ケフカ 「死ね 死ね 死ねー！！
translation: Die, die, DIE!!

source: ｹﾌｶ「な、なんですか？ すさまじい魔力を感じますね。 と、とってもはげしい魔力の 波動なんだな。
translation: Wh-what's this? I sense dreadful magical power. W-waves of terribly fierce magical energy.

source: 「まってろ！ 今たすけに行く！！
translation: : Hang on! We're coming to save you!!

source: 「いそげ！！
translation: : Hurry!!

source: 「いそぐんだ！！
translation: : Hurry up!!

source: 「時間がないぞ！
translation: : There's no time!

source: ｹﾌｶ「これは、これは。 幻獣の方々ではありませんか。 突然のおこしでおどろきましたが かんげいいたしますよ。 ぼくちんに、もっと魔石をプレゼント してくれるというのですから。
translation: Well, well. If it isn't the Genjuu. I was surprised at your sudden arrival, but allow me to welcome you. After all, it means you're giving little old me more magicite presents.

source: ｹﾌｶ「お望みどおり、魔石と 化してあげましょう！
translation: I'll turn you to magicite just like you're asking for!

source: ｹﾌｶ「まずは、そのじゃまっけな 魔力を中和するとしましょうか。
translation: First off, why don't we neutralize those troublesome magical powers.

source: ｹﾌｶ「さあ、幻獣達よ。 楽しませて下さいな。
translation: Now, O Genjuu. Please do let me enjoy myself.

source: ｹﾌｶ「ぼくちんと戦うつもり？ いいでしょう、お相手しましょう。
translation: You intend to fight little old me? Very well, let's take you on.

source: ケフカ 「そのようなものでは、この私 を倒すことなどできませんよ！ ヒッヒッ
translation: You couldn't possibly beat ME with the likes of THAT! Hee, hee!

source: ケフカ 「さあ、魔石となって、私と 共に、魔導帝国「ケフカ」を造 ろうではありませんか！！
translation: Now, turn to magicite, and together we will forge the Sorcerous Empire of Cefca!!

source: ケフカ 「おほほほ！ なんと、あたたかい手ざわり！ みたされていくー！！
translation: Oho ho ho! Oh my, warm to the touch! How gratifying!!

source: ｹﾌｶ「たあいのない。 幻獣がこんなに弱い存在だとは。 こんなのと戦っても楽しくないし さっさときりあげましょうか。
translation: Pathetic. Who'd have guessed Genjuu were such weak creatures? It's no fun fighting if you're like this, so why don't we finish things off?

source: ｹﾌｶ「ひょっ ひょっ ひょっ 魔石はこれでもうじゅうぶんですね。 あとは、封魔壁の奥にある最後の宝を 手に入れるだけです。
translation: Hyo, hyo, hyo! This makes plenty of magicite now. The only thing left is getting the final treasure inside the Mystic Barricade.

source: ｹﾌｶ「シンジラレナーイ！！！
translation: I can't BELIEVE it!!!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「レオ将軍……
translation: General Leo...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「人はみな力が 欲しいのね… 私みたいになりたいのかしら…
translation: Everyone craves power... Do they want to be like me...?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「もっと… あなたからいろんな事を教えて もらいたかった……
translation: I wanted... wanted to have you teach me about so many more things...

source: 『どうした、インターセプター！ そのケガは！？
translation: "What's wrong, Interceptor!? Those wounds!?"

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「レオ将軍だけでなく 味方のはずの{シャドウ} までも…… 帝国め！
translation: As if General Leo wasn't enough, even {Shadow}, who was supposed to be their ally... Damn the Empire!

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「これでよし。
translation: That should do it.

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「やさしいのね。
translation: You're so kind.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「{リルム}が ついていてあげる。
translation: I'll stick with you.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「しかし、こうなると 帝国に残る{エドガー}達が心配だ。 {ﾃｨﾅ}「無事だといいけど…
translation: But the way things turned out, I'm worried about {Edgar} and the others in the Empire. {Tina}: I hope they're all right...

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「帝国が裏切った。 あやうく罠にはめられる とこだった。
translation: The Empire betrayed us. We were this close to being caught in a trap.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「事前に脱出できもうした。 {エドガー}殿の情報のおかげ でござる。
translation: We managed to escape ere then. Sir {Edgar}'s information is to thank.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「さすが一国の王。
translation: He's a king for a reason.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「お茶を運んで来てくれた レディにごあいさつしたら ていねいに教えてくれたよ。
translation: I was nice to the lady who brought us tea, and she politely told me all about it.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「……べんりな特技だな。
translation: ...such a handy trick.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「女性がいるのに口説かない。 そんな失礼な事ができると思うかね？ れいぎだよ。 れ・い・ぎ。
translation: Not flirt with a woman present? Do you really think I could be so rude? It's simple courtesy. Cour-te-sy.

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「レオ将軍が殺された。 ケフカにな！
translation: General Leo was killed. By Cefca!

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「レオ殿が！？ 無念…… 帝国にいる数少ない理解者が…
translation: Sir Leo!? Such a shame... one of the few sensible men in the Empire...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「とにかく作戦のたて直しだ。 飛空艇にもどろう。
translation: Regardless, we need to rethink our tactics. Let's return to the airship.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「わしも 行ってもいいかの？
translation: May I come with you?

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「あなたは？
translation: And you are?

source: {ﾛｯｸ}「この村の人だ。
translation: He's from this village.

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「魔導士の血を引く人なの。 力になってくれるわ。
translation: He's descended from the sorcerers. He can help us.

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「力の使いかたをあやまった 帝国をほうっておくわけには ゆかんしの。
translation: I can't just leave the Empire be with the way it's misusing power.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「{リルム}も！ {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「だめじゃ。
translation: Me too! {Stragus}: No.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「子供は足手まといだしな。
translation: A kid would just slow us down.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「なにをー！このキンニク男！ {ﾏｯｼｭ}「はっ！ 口だけは たっしゃだな。じょうちゃん。
translation: What the hell, muscle man! {Mash}: Hah! You've at least got a good mouth on you, missy.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「くーっ 似顔絵かくぞ！
translation: Grrrr, I'm painting your portrait!

source: 『うわーー！ やめ ヤメ！
translation: "Whoa! No, stop!"

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「わかったわかった。 しょうがないやつじゃ。 {ﾘﾙﾑ}「やったー！
translation: Fine, fine. I don't have much choice. {Relm}: Oh, yeah!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「じゃあ、行くぜ！
translation: Then here we go!

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「どしたの？ 色男。 {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「君、いくつだい？ {ﾘﾙﾑ}「１０さいよ。
translation: What's the matter, lech? {Edgar}: How old are you? {Relm}: Ten.

source: {ﾘﾙﾑ}「変なの。先行ってるよ。
translation: You're weird. I'm going on ahead.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「さすがに犯罪か…… やめとこう。
translation: I guess it would be criminal... I'd better not.

source: わしは、ガンホー。 サマサで一番のりょうし。
translation: I'm Gungho, the best hunter in Thamasa.

source: 久しぶりに帰ってきたら 村がボロボロになっとる。 いったい何がおこったんじゃ？
translation: I'm back for the first time in ages and the village is in shambles. What on earth happened?

source: {ストラゴス}をなかまにしたらしいが あいつはどうもこしぬけでな。
translation: I hear you've added {Stragus} to your number, but he's quite the coward.

source: 若いころは、伝説のモンスター ヒドゥンを狩ろうとがんばっとったが 途中であきらめてしまいおって…
translation: Strove to hunt the legendary monster Hidden when younger, but gave up partway through...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「ガ、ガンホー！？
translation: G-Gungho!?

source: ｶﾞﾝﾎｰ「なんじゃ、{ストラゴス}か。 ヒドゥンを狩りに戻ってきたのか？
translation: Oh, it's {Stragus}. Come back to hunt Hidden?

source: ｶﾞﾝﾎｰ「その性格、変わっとらんの。 昔もそうじゃった。
translation: Your personality hasn't changed. You've always been like that.

source: 若いころは、伝説のモンスター ヒドゥンを狩ろうとがんばっとったが 途中であきらめてしまいおって…
translation: Strove to hunt the legendary monster Hidden when younger, but gave up partway through...

source: {ｽﾄﾗｺﾞｽ}「いや、別にあきらめた わけでは…… ゴニョゴニョ それに、あのモンスターはエボシ岩に しかいないし、そのエボシ岩は 海に沈んじまって… ｶﾞﾝﾎｰ「そうやって、いいのがれする ところが、おぬしの悪いところじゃ。
translation: I, uh, didn't exactly give up... mumble, mumble... And besides, that monster's only found on Eboshi Rock, and Eboshi Rock sank into the ocean, and... Gungho: Making excuses like that is the trouble with you.

source: ｶﾞﾝﾎｰ「なさけないやつじゃ…
translation: How pathetic...

translation: Idiot Genjuu! To think they opened the Mystic Barricade for us themselves. Through this door, the Three Warring Gods... once they are mine, my dream will be complete!

translation: The beginning of sorcery... the Three Warring Gods... {Tina}: Those? {Stragus}: The petrified three are said to have sealed themselves by facing each other so that their powers cancel out. {Stragus}: If the stone statues looked away from each other, the balance would crumble, and their power destroy the world... {Tina}: What!?

translation: You're finally awake. {Celes}: I... how long was I out of it? Cid: It's just reached a year. I thought you might be beyond help. {Celes}: A whole year... Cid, you took care of me?

translation: What about the others? ...{Lock}? Cid: Outside of the island... I don't know a thing. The whole world might have sunk and left just this island behind. Cid: The world has taken step after step toward destruction since that day... Plants and animals are steadily overtaken by death, and even the other survivors on the island lost hope one after another and threw themselves off the cliff on the northern cape.

translation: {Celes}. Don't get depressed. You're the only family I have in the world. Let's live together in peace here. {Celes}: Yes... Okay... Cid... No, grampa. Can I call you that? Cid: Grampa!? Heh, heh, you're making me blush. It's like I suddenly have a granddaughter... *cough* *cough* {Celes}: *giggle*, grampa.

source: ｼﾄﾞ「ははは ゴホッ ゴホッ {ｾﾘｽ}「おじいちゃん。 おなかすいたでしょ？ ｼﾄﾞ「ああ 三日前にね込んでから何も 食っておらん。 {ｾﾘｽ}「何か食べたい？ ｼﾄﾞ「…と言っても海岸の魚くらいしか 食い物はないがの。 {ｾﾘｽ}「私とってくる。
translation: Ha ha ha *cough* *cough* {Celes}: Grampa. You're hungry, aren't you? Cid: Yeah, I haven't eaten a thing since I took ill three days ago. {Celes}: Want something to eat? Cid: ...sure, except the fish at the beach are pretty much the only food here. {Celes}: I'll go catch some.

translation: Grampa. Cid: {Celes}. Leave for the outside world. I'm sure your companions are alive. {Celes}: Okay. I'll go. And I'll be sure to return. I'll bring them all with me. Cid: That {Lock} person, too...

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「ふ…… あなたが守ってくれたの？ 何の希望もない私を助けて一体…
translation: Phew... Did you protect me? Why save me when I have no hope...?

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「このバンダナは？ もしや…… {ｾﾘｽ}「ねえ、あなた 今どこから来たの？ あなたの傷を手当てしてくれた人は 生きているの？ ねえ 答えて…
translation: This bandana? Could it be...? {Celes}: Hey, where did you just come from? Is the person who treated your wounds alive? Come on, tell me...

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「あの人は… 生きているのね。 {ロック}……
translation: He... must be alive. {Lock}...

source: 「外の世界に出ろ。 仲間はきっとお前の事を待っている。 「ストーブの横の階段から 下へおりなさい。 そこに答えが待っているから。 おじいちゃんより」
translation: "Leave for the outside world. I'm sure your companions await you. Go down the stairs next to the stove. Your answer waits for you there. - Grampa"

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「おじいちゃんの分も せいいっぱい生きるわ……
translation: I'll live a life full enough to cover your share, too, grampa...

source: 世界が引き裂かれた日。 世界中のガレキが吸い取られるように 大陸のまん中にあつまってきた。 そうやってできたのがあの塔だ。
translation: The day the world was torn apart, debris from all over the world gathered in the middle of the continent like it was sucked in. And what it formed was that tower.

source: 塔の上には、三闘神の力を持った ケフカさまがいる… この世界の神だ…
translation: Atop the tower, with the power of the Three Warring Gods, is Cefca-sama... He's the god of this world...

source: もしケフカさまに逆らおうものなら 「裁きの光」がその町を焼きつくす… 逆らえないのさ…
translation: If anyone tries to stand against Cefca-sama, the Light of Judgment burns down their town... There's no opposing him...

source: 世界が引き裂かれ、あちこちで 封じられていた、いにしえの怪物が よみがえった。デスゲイズやフンババ… そして伝説の８ぴきの竜が……
translation: When the world was torn apart, ancient monsters sealed here and there were revived. Death Gaze, Humbaba... and the legendary Eight Dragons...

source: このまえ空を飛ぶデスゲイズを見た！ 飛空艇なんかで、もしあいつに 出会いでもしたら……
translation: I saw Death Gaze flying in the sky earlier! If you were on an airship or something and had a run-in with that thing...

source: １０００年前の古文書に、こんな文を 見つけました… 「この強すぎる力を、８ぴきの竜に 封印する。その名はジハード… ８ぴきの竜を倒すときふたたび 力はよみがえらん…」
translation: I found these writings in an ancient text from 1000 years ago... "Seal we this power too strong in eight dragons. Jihad is its name... Again shall the power be reborn when ye fell the eight dragons..."

source: 皇帝にたのまれた絵が完成したよ… ガストラ皇帝、本人の絵じゃ。 たのまれた物も、ちゃんと中に 入れたのに…ひにくなものじゃな… 持っていてもしかたないので ジドールに住むアウザーという金持ちに 売ってしまったよ。
translation: I completed the painting commissioned by the emperor... a portrait of Emperor Gastra himself. And I even included his special request, just like I was supposed to... it's so ironic... There was no point in keeping it, so I sold it to Auzer, a rich man who lives in Jidoor.

source: おぬしの、その目のかがやき… このまえ、この町をおとずれた モンクの男によく似ておる…
translation: That sparkle in your eyes... looks a lot like a monk man who visited this town earlier...

source: あら？ あなた… ごめんなさい。このまえ、ここに 立ちよったモンクそうが、さがして いた人に似ているものだから… その人なら、北のツェンに向かうと 言って、町を出ていったわ。
translation: Hmm? Are you...? Excuse me. You look like someone a monkish person who passed through here earlier was looking for... If you're interested, he said he was going north to Tzen when he left town.

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「{マッシュ}！ {ﾏｯｼｭ}「おっ…… {セリス}！ {ｾﾘｽ}「いま助ける！ {ﾏｯｼｭ}「まてっ！！
translation: {Mash}! {Mash}: Hey... {Celes}! {Celes}: I'll save you! {Mash}: Wait!!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「俺が動けば… 家がくずれおちる。 まず… 中にいる子供を助け出してくれ… あまりもちそうにない… 早めにたのむぜ……くっ…
translation: If I move... the house will collapse. First... save the child who's inside... I can't hold out for long... hurry and take care of things... kh...

source: 「こわいよう！ 『だいじょうぶ。さあ！
translation: : I'm scared! "You're going to be okay. Come on!"

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「くっそー！ もうもたねえ…… あ… に… き… 後のことはたのんだぜ……
translation: Dammit! I can't hold out anymore... Big... bro... the rest is up to you...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「まったぜ！
translation: About time!

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「{マッシュ}！ 生きていたのね！！
translation: {Mash}! You're alive!!

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「あたりまえよ！ たとえ、裂けた大地に、はさまれ ようとも、おれの力でこじあける！
translation: Of course! Even if I got myself caught in the torn earth, I'd wrench it open with my power!

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「もうみんな死んで しまったかと思っていた… 希望はたたれてしまったと 思っていた…… けど… あきらめちゃいけないわね。 生きているかもしれない！ みんなを探して… そして…
translation: I thought maybe everyone was dead... I thought hope was gone... But... I can't give up. They might be alive! We'll find them all... and then...

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「ああ。 ケフカを倒し、平和な世界を 取り戻す！！
translation: Right. Beat Cefca and take back our peaceful world!!

source: 「蛇の道」とよばれていた谷が 海底からその姿を現したんじゃ… ふきつな姿じゃ… そこにケフカの狂信集団たちが 塔をたてたらしい…
translation: The trench called Serpent's Way has risen from the ocean floor... It's ominous... I hear the Cefca Fanatics have built a tower there...

source: わしは見たんじゃ。はるか東にある モブリズという村が、ケフカの 「裁きの光」によって焼かれるのを… 大人は子供たちをかばってみな……
translation: I saw it. The town of Mobliz far to the east was baked by Cefca's Light of Judgment... Shielding the children, the adults all...

source: 東に行くと、海から姿を現した 「蛇の道」に出る。さらに東にいくと モブリズの村がある。 「裁きの光」によって、すべて 焼きつくされたあとじゃがな…
translation: Go east and you'll come to Serpent's Way, now sticking out of the ocean. Go further east to find the village of Mobliz. What's left of it after being burned away by the Light of Judgment, anyway...

source: 「蛇の道」を北に行くとニケアって いう町があるんだ。 そこから、船がでているらしいけど…
translation: Go north on Serpent's Way to find the town of Nikaea. I hear ships sail from there...

source: うわあ！ だれか来た！！
translation: Waah! Someone's here!!

source: ここから先にはいかせないぞ！ ボクたちだって戦えるんだ！
translation: I won't let you through here! We can fight as good as anyone!

source: まって！
translation: Wait!
"{Tina}!!"

source: 「ママ！ この人たち、ママの友達？
translation: : Mommy! Are these your friends, mommy?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「みんな…生きていたのね。 会いたかった！
translation: You're... all alive. I've missed you!

source: 『{ティナ}。 いっしょに行きましょう！ ケフカを倒さなければ、世界は 破滅してしまう… {ﾃｨﾅ}「ええ……
translation: Yes...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「私… … 戦う力が消えてしまったの…
translation: I... ... My ability to fight is gone...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「世界が引き裂かれた日 この村の大人たちは、ケフカの さばきの光から子供達をかばって みな死んでしまった…
translation: The adults of this village all died shielding the children from Cefca's Light of Judgment the day the world was torn apart...

source: 「こっちをねらってる！ 「子供たちを！！
translation: : It's coming this way! : The children!!

source: 「パパー！！ 「ママー！！！
translation: : Daddy!! : Mommy!!!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「ここは子供達だけの村… そして、ここにたどり着いた私を 子供達は必要としている…
translation: The village was just children... I made my way here, and now the children need me...

source: ﾃﾞｨｰﾝ「{ティナ}をとるな！
translation: Don't take {Tina} away!

source: ｶﾀﾘｰﾅ「ディーン… ごめんなさい。でも {ティナ}がいなくなったら 私たち、ささえを失ってしまう…
translation: Dean... We're sorry. But if {Tina} left us, we would lose what supports us...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「あの子たちが なぜ私を必要としているかは わからない… 私が、あの子たちを守らなくては ならない理由なんてない。 でも何か変な感じなの。 そして… この感情が私にめばえたとき 私から戦う力がなくなってしまった…
translation: I don't understand why those children need me... I don't have any reason that makes me need to protect those children. But I feel somehow strange. And... when this feeling sprouted in me, the ability to fight left me...

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「何かわかりかけている ような気がするの。 はっきりとは言えないけど… でもその答を見つけようと すればするほど、私の中から 戦う力がなくなっていく…
translation: It's as though I'm starting to understand something. I can't express it clearly... But the more I try to find the answer, the more the ability to fight leaves me...

source: たいへんだー！ フンババがこっちにやってくる！！
translation: We've got trouble! Humbaba's coming this way!!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「大地が引き裂かれた時 そこからよみがえった、いにしえの 怪物フンババ… この村は私が守る！！
translation: The ancient monster Humbaba, returned to life from the earth when it was torn apart... I'll protect this village!!

source: 『{ティナ}！ しっかりしろ！ くっそー 来るぞ！！
translation: "{Tina}! Pull yourself together! Crap, here it comes!!"

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「やっぱり、もう 戦う力がない…
translation: I really don't have the ability to fight anymore...

source: 「ママ！ 「しっかりして！！
translation: : Mommy! : Hang on!!

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「私、ここに残るわ。 いっしょに行っても足手まといに なる。それに、子供たちは私を必要と してる… 『しかし、{ティナ}…
translation: I'll stay here. Even if I went with you, I'd just get in the way. Besides, the children need me... "But, {Tina}..."

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「もうすこし時間が たてば… 今、私の中にめばえようとしている ものの答がでれば…
translation: Once a little more time passes... if I can find the answer to what's trying to sprout inside me...

source: フンババを追いはらってくれて ありがとう！ やつの首かざりから これがはずれて落ちてきたのを ひろったの！ あげる！！ 魔石「フェンリル」を受け取った！
translation: Thanks for driving Humbaba off! I grabbed this up when it fell off his necklace! I'll give it to you!! Accepted the magicite Fenrir!

source: この村にいた、けがをした兵隊さんも 死んじゃった……
translation: The wounded solder who was in this village died, too...

source: この船は盗賊団のかし切りだよ。
translation: This ship is booked by a band of thieves.

source: 盗賊が町のパブにたむろしてるよ。 フィガロ城から逃げてきたって。
translation: The thieves are gathered in the pub. They say they escaped from Figaro Castle.

source: フィガロ城は砂漠の中を進行中に事故が 起きて止ってしまったんですって。
translation: Figaro Castle had an accident and stopped while moving through the desert, they say.

source: 世界が引き裂かれて 気がついたら１人ドマ城にいたんだ。 眠ると夢の中に悪魔がでてきて… ウウ…今考えただけでもおそろしい…
translation: When I woke up after the world was torn apart, I was alone in Doma Castle. Demons appeared in my dreams when I slept... Brr... even now, just thinking about it terrifies me...

source: 牢屋がぐうぜん大ミミズの巣に つながったんだ。 そこを通って地上まで出てきた。
translation: The jail happened to connect to a nest of giant worms. We went through there and came out above ground.

source: 前のボスはあの日に死んじまったよ。 今はこの町で出会ったジェフがボスさ。
translation: Our last boss died that day. Now Jeff is our boss. We met in this town.

source: ボスはフィガロに乗り込む気だ。 俺達の宝がフィガロの倉庫に しまってあるからな。
translation: The boss means to get into Figaro. Our treasure's locked up in a Figaro storeroom.

source: 俺達だけが知っている秘密の洞窟から フィガロ城にのりこむのさ。
translation: We're getting into Figaro Castle through a secret cave only we know about.

source: そろそろ行こうかのおー！
translation: Guess it's about time to get going!

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「なんだお前ら？ {ｾﾘｽ}「も、もしかして {エドガー}じゃない？
translation: What's with you? {Celes}: A-aren't you {Edgar}?

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「{エドガー}？ ｼﾞｪﾌ「わけのわからない事を… こぞうこれくれ。
translation: {Edgar}? Jeff: You're not making any sense... I'll take this, kid.

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「これからフィガロ行きの船に 乗るのにいそがしいんだ。 {ｾﾘｽ}「とぼけないでよ {エドガー}？ それとも……記憶をなくしたの？
translation: I'm busy with getting us on the ship to Figaro after this. {Celes}: Don't play dumb. {Edgar}? Or... have you lost your memory?

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「オレは生まれた時から あらくれ者のジェフって名さ、レディ
translation: I've been Jeff the hoodlum since I was born, lady.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「なに言ってるんだよ アニキ！
translation: What are you saying, big bro!?

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「レディなんて言うのは {エドガー}さんだけよ。
translation: Only {Edgar}-san would say "lady".

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「レディにやさしくってのは 世界のじょうしきなんだよ。
translation: "Be gentle with a lady" is common sense the world over.

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「フィガロ城に入る方法は お前らがよくしっているな？ 子分「オー
translation: You guys know all about a way to get into Figaro Castle, right? Henchman: Sure do!

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「案内してくれ。 潜入してから俺がしきをとる。
translation: Lead the way there. I'll take command once we're in.

source: 世界が引き裂かれた日から フィガロ城がなくなって……
translation: Figaro Castle has been gone since the day the world was torn apart...

source: フィガロ城は砂漠の中で故障して いるんだ。 呼吸ができなくて中の人はもう…
translation: Figaro Castle is broken down inside the desert. If they can't breathe in there...

source: たとえ「裁きの光」で１００回 町が壊れようとも １０１回なおしてやる！
translation: Even if the town's destroyed by the Light of Judgment a hundred times, we'll rebuild it a hundred and one times!

source: ﾀﾞﾝｶﾝの妻「うちの主人 生きていたわ！ ナルシェの北で修業するって…
translation: My husband's alive! Says he's training north of Narshe...

source: 生き返りの秘宝を探し歩いている若者が さっきまで町にいたよ。
translation: A youngster searching for the arcane treasure that restores life was in town until recently.

source: 失う命もあれば、新しく生まれる命も あるはず！ よっしゃー ガンバルぞ！！
translation: If there are lives lost, surely new lives will be born too! All right! Let's get to it!!

source: もう…… あの人ったら。
translation: Oh... that man.

source: ジェフは信用できるボスだ。 でもどっかで見た顔だよな。
translation: Jeff's a boss we can count on. But I could swear I've seen his face somewhere before.

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「…助けに行く…… 待ってろよ…… ……？ お前達、まだいたのか？ {ｾﾘｽ}「{エドガー}なんでしょ？
translation: ...I'm coming to save you... hang on... ...? You guys are still here? {Celes}: You're {Edgar}, aren't you?

source: 「ボス、用意ができましたぜ。 行きましょう。 ｼﾞｪﾌ「人違いだぜ。あきらめな。
translation: : Boss, preparations are complete. Let's go. Jeff: Mistaken identity. Give it up.

source: ｼﾞｰｸﾌﾘｰﾄﾞ「この先は危険だぜ。 俺様が先に行ってモンスターどもを 残らずかたづけて来てやる。 ここで待ってな。
translation: It's dangerous ahead. I'll go first and take care of every last monster. Wait here.

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「さ、どうする？
translation: So, what now?

source: よ～し よし よし カメちゃん エサだよ。
translation: Heeeere boy, over here. Have some food, lil' turtle.

source: 「ね？ ｼﾞｪﾌ「やるな。 「おれ昔カメかってたんっす。
translation: : See? Jeff: Not bad. : I used to have a pet turtle.

source: すたこら さっさーー！
translation: I'm outta here, on the double!

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「だいじょうぶか？ もうすぐのしんぼうだ。
translation: You okay? Hold on a little bit longer.

source: く くるしい……
translation: C-can't breathe...

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「こいつが… からまっていたせいか… 「ボス！どうしやす？ 宝が隠してある部屋は この奥でっせ！
translation: So this is why... that's tangled up in things... : Boss! What now? The room where the treasure's hidden is past here!

source: ｼﾞｪﾌ「俺がくい止めている間に お前らが… 「ボス！危険ですぜ！！ ｼﾞｪﾌ「いいから行け！！
translation: While I fend it off, you guys can... : Boss! That's dangerous!! Jeff: Just go, already!!

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「{エドガー}！！
translation: {Edgar}!!

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「何ボケっと つったってる！！ {セリス}！ 手伝ってくれよ！ {ｾﾘｽ}「やっぱり{エドガー}ね。
translation: What are you standing around for!? {Celes}! Give me a hand! {Celes}: I KNEW you were {Edgar}.

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「しらばっくれて。 {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「フィガロが 故障したって話を聞いてな。 助けに行きたいけど砂の中だろ。 そんな時にあいつらが城から 出てきたって話を聞いてな。 {ｾﾘｽ}「利用したわけね。 {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「秘密の洞窟に案内して もらうまでフィガロ王だって事を バラすわけにはいかなかったからな。 {ｾﾘｽ}「かつては自分達を牢に 入れていた王様だからね。
translation: Way to play dumb. {Edgar}: I heard that Figaro had broken down. I wanted to go help, but, well, it was inside the sand. That's when I heard about those guys coming out of the castle. {Celes}: So you used them. {Edgar}: I couldn't be exposed as King Figaro before I got them to lead me to the secret cave. {Celes}: You're the king who once put them in jail, after all.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「みずくせえな。
translation: Quit acting like we're strangers.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「おっとまずい。 かくれろ。
translation: Whoops, that's not good. Hide.

source: 「ボス！……？ ボス？
translation: : Boss! ...? Boss?

source: 「もしや、あの怪物にやられて……
translation: : Did he get wasted by that monster...?

source: 「みじかい間のボスだったけど… 「行こうか……
translation: : He wasn't our boss for long, but still... : Let's go, I guess...

source: 『いいの？宝は……？ {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「宝など なんの価値も無い。 本当の悪はケフカさ。 やつらには罪はない。 {ｾﾘｽ}「いっしょに行く？
translation: Treasure's worthless. The real evil is Cefca. Those guys are harmless. {Celes}: Then you're coming along?

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「またハデに やらかそうぜ！アニキ！！
translation: It's time to shake things up again, big bro!!

source: なおったんですね！ そ～れ ふじょ～～
translation: It's fixed! And... surfacing!

source: お花の種を植えたんだけど ちっとも、芽がでてこないの…
translation: We planted flower seeds, but the sprouts aren't coming up at all...

source: 草木もその生命力を失ったよう… 新しい、芽や花がちっともさきません。
translation: It's like the plants have lost their life force, too... New sprouts and flowers aren't growing at all.

source: こんな世界でも夢をかなえるやつは おるもんじゃ。 わしの弟はかなえたよ… 北の地でこの世界にふさわしい夢をな…
translation: Even in a world like this, there are people whose dreams are granted. My younger brother's came true... a dream fitting to this world, in the lands to the north...

source: コロシアムにものすごく強いやつが いるそうじゃ。 「いちげきのやいば」をねらってる らしい。
translation: They say there's some amazingly strong guy at the coliseum. Supposedly he's after an Ichigeki Blade.

source: えっ？ {ロック}かい？ きっと伝説の秘宝を、さがしもとめて 世界を飛び回っているだろう。 ん？ だからね えっ その秘宝の隠し場所を、あんた達も 追って行けば、行きつく先に {ロック}がいるってことさ。
translation: What? {Lock}? No doubt he's rushing around the world in search of the legendary arcane treasure. Hm? Like I'm saying, see, if you can track down where that arcane treasure's hiding, then get there and you'll find {Lock}, too.

source: すてきな、おヒゲのおじさまが この町にやってきたの。 「ござる」がとてもチャーミング！ マランダに行くと言ってたわ。
translation: A fine older man with a mustache came by this village. His "thou" was so charming! He said he was going to Maranda.

source: ナルシェは、魔物だらけ… 俺は帰るところを失ったんだ… もうだめだよ……
translation: Narshe is crawling with monsters... I don't have a home to return to... It's all over...

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「{セッツァー}！ {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「生きていたか。
translation: {Setzer}! {Setzer}: You're alive, then.

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「いっしょに行きましょう。 ケフカを倒しに！ {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「ふ… もう俺は何もやる気力が無いよ。 {ｾﾘｽ}「何を言っているのよ。 {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「もともと俺は ギャンブルの世界… 人の心にゆとりがあった平和な世界に のっかって生きて来た男… そんな俺に、この世界はつらすぎる。 それに翼も失ってしまった…
translation: Come with us. We're going to beat Cefca! {Setzer}: Phew... I don't have any motivation to do anything anymore. {Celes}: What are you talking about? {Setzer}: I've always lived in a gambler's world... a peaceful world where people could afford to take chances... This world's too harsh for someone like me. And I've lost my wings, too...

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「世界が引き裂かれる 前に、あなたは私達と必死に戦って くれたじゃない？ あんなつらい戦いに…… {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「でももう俺は… 夢を無くしちまった。 {ｾﾘｽ}「こんな世界だからこそ もう一度、夢を追わなければならない んじゃない？ 世界をとりもどす夢を…！
translation: Didn't you fight frantically alongside us before the world was torn apart? In such harsh battles... {Setzer}: But now I've... I've lost my dreams. {Celes}: Isn't it precisely because the world is like this that we have to chase our dream once more? Our dream of taking back the world...!

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「ふふ…… あんたの言うとおりだぜ。 つきあってくれるか？ 俺の夢に…
translation: Hu hu... it's just as you say. Would you come with me? To my dream...

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「ありがとう。 行こう… ダリルの墓へ…
translation: Thanks. Let's go... to Daryl's tomb...

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「…… よみがえらせる… もうひとつの翼を！
translation: ...... I'm bringing them back to life... the other wings!

source: 話を聞いてたら思ったんだ。 負けちゃあ… いけないって！ ナルシェに行ってみるといい。 氷づけの幻獣… あんた達なら、眠りをさませるかも しれない！
translation: I had a thought when I heard you. Giving in... it's no good! You should try going to Narshe. The icebound Genjuu... you guys just might be able to awaken it from its slumber!

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「ここは…… あなたの友達の…… {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「たいしたヤツだ。 世界がひっくり返っちまったってのに ビクともしちゃいねェ。
translation: This place... is your friend's...? {Setzer}: She was really something. Wouldn't blink an eye even if the whole world flipped upside-down.

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「なんたって墓だからな。 いろいろ出るかもしれないぜ。 気をつけな。
translation: Anyway, a tomb is a tomb. No telling what might show up. Keep an eye out.

source: よい言葉がうかばない……
translation: Nothing appropriate comes to mind...

source: 文字がきざまれている……
translation: Letters are inscribed...

source: よや
translation: NPEA

source: かに
translation: RIEND

source: すら
translation: CEOF

source: とも
translation: RESTI

source: ともよ やすらかに
translation: REST IN PEACE O FRIEND

source: 地下３階の奥の部屋に グローエッグをかくす……
translation: I hide a Grow Egg in the back room of the third floor underground...

source: ダリルここに眠る
translation: Here rests Daryl

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「いろいろと思い出すぜ。
translation: I'm remembering all sorts of things.

source: ﾀﾞﾘﾙ「今度のテスト飛行は 危険かもしれない。
translation: The test flight this time could be dangerous.

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「船の限界まで 挑戦するなんてムチャだ！！
translation: Taking the ship to her limits is insane!!

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「足もとに気をつけな。
translation: Watch your step.

source: ﾀﾞﾘﾙ「私にもしもの事があったら ファルコンはよろしく。
translation: If anything should happen to me, take care of the Falcon.

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「バカ言え！ ファルコンをいただくのは スピードでお前に勝った時だ。 {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「それまでは俺の前から 逃がさねェ。 ﾀﾞﾘﾙ「ふっ すきにしな！
translation: Don't be ridiculous! I'll be taking the Falcon when I beat you in speed. {Setzer}: I'm not letting you get away from me until then. Daryl: Hah, have it your way!

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「やっぱり空は最高だな！
translation: The sky really is the greatest!

source: ﾀﾞﾘﾙ「いつまで後にいるつもり？ くやしかったら私の前に出てみな。
translation: How long are you gonna stay behind? Try passing me if you don't like it.

source: ﾀﾞﾘﾙ「それとも私のおしりが そんなにみりょく的なのかしら？
translation: Or maybe my butt's just that captivating?

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「さすがだな。
translation: I'd expect no less from you.

source: ﾀﾞﾘﾙ「これからが本番よ。 きろくをぬりかえるわ！ くもをぬけ、世界で一番近く星空を 見る女になるのよ！
translation: Now for the real thing. I'm rewriting the records! I'll race past the clouds and be the woman who saw the stars closest up!

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「日没までにかえれ！ いつものおかでおちあおう！
translation: Be back by sunset! Let's meet on our usual hill!

source: 遠くの土地で 壊れたファルコンを見つけたのは それから１年後だった……
translation: It was a year later when I found the Falcon wrecked in a distant land...

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「俺はファルコンを せいびし大地の下に眠らせてやった…
translation: I fixed up the Falcon and put her to sleep underground...

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「これがファルコン？
translation: This is the Falcon?

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「羽を失っちゃあ 世界最速の男になれないからな。 また夢を見させてもらうぜ。 ファルコンよ。
translation: I can't be the world's fastest man if I've lost my wings. It's time you let me dream again, Falcon.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「今度は俺達の夢を。 {ｾﾘｽ}「がれきの塔の ケフカを倒しに行きましょう。 {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「このファルコン号で 塔の上空まで行き、着陸しようと すれば乗り込めるはずだ！
translation: Now it's time for our dream. {Celes}: Let's go beat Cefca in the tower of debris. {Edgar}: If we fly over the tower in the Falcon and go for a landing, we should be able to get inside!

source: {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「ああ そして俺達の仲間をさがそう。
translation: Right, and let's search for the rest of us, too.

source: {ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「そう 俺達にもまだ夢はある。 いや夢をつくりだせる！
translation: Yes, we still have our dreams. Or rather, we can build our dreams!

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「あの鳥は？！もしや…
translation: That bird!? Could it be...?

source: {ｾﾘｽ}「{セッツァー}！追って！ {ｾｯﾂｧｰ}「どうした？ {ｾﾘｽ}「わからない…… けど、あの鳥の行く先に 仲間がまっていそうで…
translation: {Setzer}! After it! {Setzer}: What's the matter? {Celes}: I'm not sure... but it feels like one of us will be waiting where that bird's going...

source: このまえここをおとずれた剣士… なかなかのうでまえじゃった。 だが心にまよいがある。 まよいがなくなったその時 きっと、最強の必殺剣をあみだす じゃろう！
translation: A swordsman stopped by here... he was remarkably skilled. But there was doubt in his heart. When his doubt is gone, I'm sure he'll work out the most powerful Deathblow Sword of all!

source: 俺はもと盗賊。 あいぼうが、ねごとで 「宝箱の右…」って言ってたぜ。
translation: I'm a former thief. My buddy used to mumble, "right of the treasure chest..." in his sleep.

source: 旅人や盗賊から聞いた話で 引き裂かれた世界がどうなったか だいたいわかってきたよ… 教えてあげようか？
translation: Listening to travelers and thieves, I've gotten a good idea of what's become of our torn-apart world... Shall I tell you about it?

source: 「ここはデンジャーだぜ」 って教えてくれるゾゾの男 知ってるかい？ あの町でただ１人の正直なやつだ。 あいつなら、なにかと助けになって くれるかもね。
translation: Know the man in Zozo who tells you, "this is a dangerous place"? He's the one honest guy in that town. He just might help you out somehow.

source: 最近よく、ローラに手紙がとどくの。 モブリズの彼からかしら？
translation: Letters often come to Lola lately. From her boyfriend in Mobliz?

source: ﾛｰﾗ「見て。この部屋にある花は みんなモブリズにいる彼が送ってきて くれたの。 よーく見て、手作りの造花よ。 草木が花をさかせなくなった この時代に、彼がつくってくれた花… これが彼からの手紙…
translation: Look at all the flowers in this room. My boyfriend in Mobliz sent them to me. Look closely, they're handmade artificial flowers. He made me flowers, in this age when plants no longer come into bloom... Here's a letter from him...

source: 『？？？ モブリズはケフカの裁きの光で…？ 『誰かが、かわりに手紙を…？
translation: "??? Didn't Cefca's Light of Judgment hit Mobliz...?" "Is someone writing in his place...?"

source: 愛するローラへ 村の再建も、ひとくぎりついて… そろそろ国に帰ろうと思っていた ところでござる…
translation: To my beloved Lola, A phase of village reconstruction is done... I was thinking mayhap I would return home anon...

source: 『…なんか文が…… 『{カイエン}っぽいな…… でも、どこから手紙を送って いるのか？
translation: "...this writing looks..." "Awfully {Cayenne}-ish... but where is he sending the letters from?"

source: ﾛｰﾗ「彼への返事、伝書鳥のところまで とどけてくださいませんか？
translation: Could I ask you to take my reply to him out to the carrier pigeon?

source: {ﾃｨﾅ}「レオ将軍…… 私…あなたが言った事 わかりかけてきた気がするの。
translation: General Leo... I... feel as though I've begun to understand what you said.

translation: I'll fight as long as there's anyone in this world to protect.

source: {ｶｲｴﾝ}「すごい機械でござるな。
translation: This be a remarkable mechanism.

source: {ｼｬﾄﾞｳ}「……
{ｴﾄﾞｶﾞｰ}「俺が死んだら 世界中のレディが悲しむからな。
translation: Ladies the world over would mourn if I died.

source: {ﾏｯｼｭ}「おーーーし！

translation: Let's hurry up and go beat that cackling bastard!

source: {ﾓｸﾞ}「クポッポー！！

source: {ｶﾞｳ}「{ガウ}、獣ケ原で 強くなる。

{ｳｰﾏﾛ}「ウー……

translation: Death Gaze's wound was healed! Death attack capability recovers.

source: デスゲイズの毒のつめを封じた！ 毒の攻撃が出来ない！！

source: 「魔石ケーツハリー」を手にいれた。

translation: Fwa hwa hwa!!! What's with that face!? You didn't think I was dead, did you!?

translation: What's this, now? {Mash}, could you be... crying...?

translation: Fwa hwa hwa! I won't die! Even if I got myself caught in the torn earth, I'd wrench it open with my power!

translation: {Mash}! I shall grant you the ultimate technique! Go use it to wipe the floor with Cefca!

source: いくぞ！

translation: *cough*... *cough*... Don't worry about me. Go! Beat Cefca to a bloody pulp!!!
